121111.title: Feeding with friends.

1211112.content:
"Julie, wait! Don't you think I should put on some clothes first?"

         The Pikachu morph giggled as she stepped off the last of the stairs, pulling Ray by his meaty hand. "Nah, I'm sure it's fine. They've seen you before."

         "In my boxers?"

         "Well... no. But you're a guy, and it's our house, so you can get away with wearing less!" With another giggle, Julie added, "Besides, at least one of them's gonna like seeing you half-naked!"

         "What--" Ray paused. He sniffed at the air. "Hey, that smells good."

         As the two turned a corner into the dining room, a heavy aroma mixed with various scents wafted through the air. Ray did a double take at the sight before him: a breakfast buffet nearly filling the entire table. Pancakes, syrup, sausages, hash browns, waffles, more syrup, french toast, even more syrup, and a great many other foods were just waiting for the Raichu morph to dig in. It was as much a feast for the eyes as it would be a feast for his gut. The only question was, how much would he be able to eat?

         The sound of someone clearing their throat snapped Ray out of his stupor. He turned to see Julie standing next to three other female morphs. They each stared back at him expectantly.

         "O-oh! Uh..." Ray absentmindedly scratched his stomach and forced a chuckle. "Good morning."

         "Hi, Ray!" chirped an Eevee morph.

         "Hey, Ray," greeted a Meditite morph.

         "Good morning, Ray," said a Meowstic morph.

         In terms of their bodies, three girls were about the same as Julie. They were all taller than her, but not by much. Even the tallest one, the Meditite, was just half a head taller than the Pikachu morph. Their curves weren't very pronounced, either, though they were easier to notice than Julie's. The Eevee morph rocked back and forth on her feet, her hands clasped behind her back. The Meditite morph had a more relaxed posture, with one hand on her hip. The Meowstic morph just stood still, a small smile on her face.

         "Ray, this is Stacie..." Julie motioned to the Eevee. "... she's Tanya..." She gestured toward the Meditite. "... and I think you've met Sylvia before," she finished, pointing at the Meowstic. All three of them waved, and Ray waved back.

         "Uh..." The large Raichu scratched his double chin. "Didn't she come over to study with you that one time?"

         "Mm-hmm." Julie nodded. With a grin, she said, "Anyway, we should really probably get to stuffing you before the food gets cold! Ladies, let's give our big man a hand!"

         The Pikachu snapped her fingers, and the four of them grabbed Ray and led him over to a chair. Julie and Tanya pulled him by the arms, while Stacie and Sylvia pushed him by his butt. Ray blushed at the contact from the latter two, but said nothing.

         "Don't worry," said Stacie, pushing Ray by his right butt cheek, "we made sure everything's extra yummy for you, big guy!"

         Tanya, who had taken his left arm, added, "And by 'we', she means 'our parents'. Nice boxers, by the way."

         The Raichu's face turned an even brighter shade of red. I wasn't aware I had such an enthusiastic fan club. Heck, it's crazy I even have one at all! Wait, do they actually count as one? I know Julie said they knew about me and even wanted to help out, but--

         "Hellooooo! Earth to big bro!"

         Ray snapped out of his thoughts. He was already sitting down at the table, and placed in front of him was a plate completely covered in hash browns. The plump pokemorph reached for a fork, but his hand met with nothing but the tablecloth. Before he could ask the others where one was, one of the girls--Sylvia, judging from the hand's white fur--quickly picked up a bite and shoved it in the Raichu's partially open mouth.

         "To be totally honest with you," Julie started, coming up behind the Meowstic, "I wanted first dibs, but Sylvia's got a crush on you, so... y'know."

         "Mmph?" He swallowed. "Crush?"

         Sylvia gave her what Ray assumed to be a pointed stare (he could never tell with stoics). "I would have preferred to disclose that information myself."

         Julie shrugged. "Sorry, but you probably woulda beat around the bush."

         "Besides," Stacie chimed in, "doesn't it feel better to have it out in the open? I'd totally feel better about it!"

         "I bet Ray likes having a fangirl, anyway." Tanya snickered.

         Sighing, Sylvia returned her attention to Ray. "Don't worry, they're merely exaggerating. I would hardly consider myself 'in love' with someone I don't know on any personal level. My attraction to you is purely physical."

         The Raichu morph nodded. "I see." He went silent for a few seconds. "So you're, uh... into bigger guys, I take it?"

         Sylvia blinked a few times in rapid succession. Hurriedly, she asked, "Would care for more hash browns? You seem a bit famished."

         Before Ray could respond, The Meowstic shoved another forkful of hash browns into his mouth. He hesitated for a moment, then slowly chewed his food.

         Might as well roll with it.

         The Raichu morph grinned widely, turning his double chin into a triple. "Alright, bring on the food!"

------

         "Oooohh, yeah." Ray rubbed his engorged belly. "That sure hit the spot."

         "Glad you liked it, bro!"

         Ray couldn't remember the last time he had ever been so stuffed. It had been quite awhile since he was full to the point where he wouldn't need to tide himself over with a snack or five before lunch. It showed, too, as his belly had become a tad more spherical, and had gone from filling most of his lap to practically all of it. The feeling was slightly uncomfortable, but it still brought a smile to his face. He remembered back when he first started upping his food intake. Back then, it only took an extra burger to reach this state. Nowadays...

         He surveyed the results of his breakfast. Most of the plates were cleaned off, and those that weren't were having their leftovers devoured by Julie and her friends. The sight made Ray smile. As impressed as he was by his own gluttony, he felt relieved that he left behind enough for the girls to have some breakfast as well. In fact, they seemed nearly starved, given the way they all dug in to their food. Feeding Ray personally must have made them insanely hungry.

         The sound of the kitchen phone ringing drew him from his thoughts.

         "Don't worry, sis, I'll get it."

         Julie stopped in the middle of spearing a whole sausage and looked up at her brother. "Are you sure, bro? I mean, you just ate, so-- "

         "Nah, it's fine. You just worry about enjoying your food."

         "'Kay, Ray."

         With a grunt, Ray forced himself up and out of his seat. Cradling his belly, he slowly waddled his way over to the kitchen and the incessantly ringing phone.

         "Yeah, yeah, hold your horses," he grumbled. The Raichu morph turned a bit to his side and picked the phone up. "Hello?"
1211112.title: Meetin' & Greetin' (and Eatin'!)

choices: ... a mostly thin female Espeon morph, though her belly seems a bit bigger.
... a male Salemence morph who's older and even fatter than Ray.
12111121.content:
Ray's cheeks instantly flared a bright red. "H-hey yourself."

         "Aw, come on. We've been together for how long and you still get flustered?"

         The Raichu morph rolled his eyes. "Like I can help it. You always call me using your sexy voice."

         "Oh, don't try to pretend you don't love it."

         "True enough. You sure know how to drive me crazy."

         "In a good way, right?"

         A smirk tugged at Ray's lips. "In the best way."

         "Oh-ho, somebody's in a good mood! I take it you had a good breakfast?"

         "Best I've had in a long time. Remember I told you how Julie wanted to help feed me? Well, she decided to get a few of her friends involved, and they got their parents to make to some food for me."

         "Wow."

         "And by 'some', I mean 'entire plates chock full of the best meals you could think of and then some'."

         There was a whistling sound on the other side of the line. "Lucky you, huh Sweet Cheeks? How'd they manage to convince their folks to make that much food?"

         "Well..." Ray scratched the back of his head. "Not to brag, but I'm pretty big around my neighborhood."

         "Pun intended?"

         "Of course. But yeah, just about everybody here likes me. Can you believe a fat guy like me's gotten this much positive attention?"

         "I know, you never hear about stuff like that! So anyway, will it still be just the two of us at your place, or...?"

         "Yup, just us. Julie said she and her friends were planning on spending the day out and about." The Raichu morph couldn't help but lick his lips. Whether it was a meal or just the two of them alone, their time together would always be fun of some form or another.

         "Perfect! I'll stop by around eleven." There was a brief pause. "Say, what are you wearing right now?"

         "Uh, just a pair of boxers..."

         "My my, and with company over too?!"

         Ray's blush returned. "Yeah, heh heh... Julie yanked me downstairs before I could get dressed."

         "Sure she did. Alright, I'll leave you to digest in peace. See you in a couple hours, Sweet Cheeks!"

         "Till then."

         And with that, Ray hung up. He spent a few minutes patting and stroking his belly, lightly moaning at its tautness. No matter how fat he got, stuffing himself silly was always the best feeling in the world, and the fact that it took more and more effort as he got bigger only made it all the better when he succeeded.

         Eventually, the hefty 'morph waddled back into the dining room and sat back down. The girls had just finished their meals and were massaging their own stuffed tummies.

         "Who called?" Julie asked between groans.

         Ray, having gone back to stroking his belly, replied, "Special visitor. Should be here around eleven."

         Her ears perked up. "Oh yeah, you told me about that! Hey girls, let's get a move on! We'll see you later, bro!"

         Each girl slowly got up to leave, waving their good-byes and taking their plates with them. Ray waved back, though he was more focused on digesting his meal. He lost all track of time as his stomach gradually softened up, pleasurable sighs and murmurs escaping from his lips all the while.

         Before he knew it, the doorbell ring and snapped him back to reality. He got up from his seat only to immediately realize he never bothered getting dressed. Blushing furiously, the Raichu morph rushed up to the front door.

         "I'll be right with you!" he shouted. "Just give me a minute to put on some clothes!"

         An unmistakable chuckle came from the other side. "Oh, you don't need to worry about that. This wouldn't be the first time, y'know."

         The blush returned. "Good point." At that, Ray shook his head and opened the door, and in walked...
12111121.title: Plans for the Day

choices: While they cuddle on the couch, Ray reminisces about the day they met.
Fast-forward to lunchtime, the two chat about their plans for the week.
121111212.content:
Ray couldn't keep himself from grinning as the 6'8" Salamence hauled his 507 pound frame inside. The Raichu morph's eyes were immediately drawn to the dragon's magnificently huge gut, which was only half covered by a white tank top. It jiggled and bounced freely, unafraid to come up and slap the world in its face. Each bounce gave allowed a quick little peak at the meaty thighs beneath. To compare them to regular old tree trunks would have been far too mild. To compare his thighs to the largest, most splendid tree trunks was far more fitting. And no other parts of the dragon's body were spared, either. His cheeks were round, his double chin was working its way to triple chin status, his neck had any and all of its definition buried in a coating of fat, and his arms and shoulders were as soft and squishy as dough. Truly, this was a body built for comfort.

         A low, throaty chuckle from the 25-year-old dragon made Ray snap his focus up to his visitor's face. Knowing grins were exchanged before the Salamence morph turned around and closed the door behind him. This gave Ray an excellent view of a plump posterior and a thick tail guaranteed to fill up at least half of the average three-seat couch. The black spandex shorts left nothing to the imagination, clinging to whatever they could as if their life depended on it.

         "Likin' what you see, Sweet Cheeks?" The Salamence morph chuckled again. "Don't leave much to the imagination, huh?"

         Ray let out a chuckle of his own. "Always the tease, aren't you Big Sully?"

         "Ah, you're used to it." Grin widening, Sullivan "Big Sully" the Salamence opened his arms wide. "Now c'mere and greet me properly."

         Seeing no need to be told twice, Ray waddled over, hugged Sullivan tightly, and locked lips. Sully moaned in approval and kissed back with no small amount of fervor. Ray's heart fluttered. The dragon's lips were firm as always, unyielding and constantly pushing the Raichu morph to keep up. A sudden squeeze of both butt cheeks caused him to let out a surprised squeak. His cheeks burned brighter than before. The temptation to melt into Sully's embrace and let him handle everything was quite staggering.

         But then again, what fun would that be?

         Sullivan purred as Ray began to run his hands up and down the dragon's back, pausing to grab at a love handle here and there. The two pressed together even more tightly and pushed at each other's lips till they finally became short of breath and had to separate. They panted in unison, their hot breath mixing, and stared deeply into each other's eyes.

         "Much better," Sully said with a slight growl. "Think you can keep this up all week?"

         Ray grinned. "Just watch me. C'mon, let's go get comfortable." He began to head for the living room, but stopped when he realized Sullivan wasn't following. The Raichu morph was about to ask if he was coming, but couldn't quite get the words out upon seeing him taking off his tank top. It, along with the spandex, were casually tossed aside, leaving the hefty dragon clad in nothing but a pair of boxers that failed to reach past his buttocks.

         "Figured it'd be more comfy if we're both stripped down." Sully's grin was so sly it could be mistaken as predatory. "Wanna ditch the undies, too?"

         Ray could have sworn his cheeks were on the verge of bursting into flames. "Dah- bah- I-I-I think we'll just- we'll just save that for showering, if-if you don't mind!" It was only a second after the words left his mouth that he realized the implications of what he said. He squeaked and clamped a hand over his mouth.

         A hardy laugh from Sully made his body quake and jiggle. "Showering, eh? Dunno if the two of us'll fit, but okay! Just scrub me extra good and I'll do the same!" He laughed again. "I swear, Sweet Cheeks, you've got a real feisty side to ya. Can't get enough of it."

         "Yeah, yeah," Ray muttered. Despite the embarrassment, he couldn't help but smile when he looked back up into Sully's eyes. Oh, how the Raichu morph loved that stare. So lively and mischievous one second, and then so calm and enticing the next. "Anyway, shall we go get settled on the couch?"

         Sully scratched his gut. "Sure. Hope you don't mind a tight fit."

         "With you, a tight fit is a blessing."
121111212.title: Enter Sullivan

choices: "... I've got a nice little gift for ya."
"... I forgot my stuff for the week, so I need to go back 'n' get it."
1211112121.content:
Four years ago...

Subject: Ray the Raichu
Age: 14
Classification: scrawny toothpick (131 lbs.)

         The chill atmosphere of the pharmacy did nothing to relax Ray's rapidly beating heart. In his hand was a bottle of appetite stimulants. They most likely weren't as potent as a prescription brand would be, but it would be a helpful starting tool all the same. Potency wasn't really what concerned him at the moment. To the lanky Raichu morph, buying the pills would be committing himself to bulking up â€“ either he'd go all out and gain as much weight as his body could carry, or he'd give up and let his metabolism eat up any fat he might have had otherwise.

         Being honest with himself, Ray didn't really have a long-term plan beyond gaining to whatever point he felt most comfortable with. But how big would that be? After adding 100 pounds? 200? And if he changed his mind, would he ever be able to lose the weight? Granted, he was planning on working out so he could carry that weight, butâ€”

         "You alright there, buddy?" Ray nearly jumped out of his fur. "Whoa, sorry! Didn't mean to scare ya!"

         Now preoccupied with something other than his lifestyle choices, Ray turned around to face a Salamence morph grinning at him. He was taller than Ray, as most Salamences would be, and had an overall pudgy look that was just shy of being chubby. The dragon's gut still had a ways to go before it could poke out of his shirt and over his waistline. Small layers of padding were apparent on his arms, legs, and even his cheeks.

         "So," he said, "you got a name? Mine's Sullivan."

         "Ray." The Raichu morph couldn't help but smile. It wasn't every day you met a friendly stranger.

         Sullivan nodded. "Cool, cool. So, Ray, why're you shopping for appetite stimulants? Feeling too skinny?"

         Ray blushed and looked away. "You could say that..." He shut his eyes, bracing himself for any mockery to come his way. It wouldn't make sense for it come from someone who's already overweight, but there was always the chance of a complete lack of self-awareness.

         Luckily, Sullivan was nothing of the sort. In fact...

         "You too, eh?"

         "Huh?" Ray opened his eyes and turned back to Sullivan so fast it almost hurt his neck. "What do you me-- Wait, you're gaining weight?"

         "Yup!" Sullivan smacked his gut for emphasis. "Broke 200 just a couple weeks ago! How big're you thinking of going?"

         "Um..." Ray looked down at the bottle in his hand. "I don't really know. Whatever size I like, I guess. But that's not what I'm worried about. What I am worried about is actually going through with this."

         "Worried about what your friends and family'd think?"

         "No, I already told them all about it. They're cool with it, as long as I don't go overboard. And Mom and Dad told me to exercise. It's more stuff like buying plus-size clothes and taking up extra space and stuff."

         He sighed. "I know I'm over-thinking it and dwelling on dumb junk, but you gotta understand I've never done anything like this. And the only reason I got this whole idea was some weight gain sites I found when I was looking for tips on getting muscle. Weird, right? But I guess that's what happens you look up 'tips for bulking up' instead of 'tips for gaining muscle'."

         For a moment, Sullivan said nothing. He just stared at Ray, looking pensive. Then he smiled, and walked over to pat the Raichu morph's shoulder. "I get ya," the dragon said. "Ya wanna try out this crazy lifestyle you never even thought of takin' up, and you're worried if it's worth the effort or not."

         "And the money."

         "Right, that too." Sullivan patted Ray's shoulder again. "Well buddy, I'll be frank with ya: it's gonna take some doing before you actually get anywhere. Hell, I started two months ago and this is all I've got so far. But y'know what? I don't care it's been slow goin', 'cause stuffin' myself silly is the best feeling ever! You'd probably love it too. You like eating, right?"

         "Yeah, I guess I do..." Ray hummed in thought. After a moment, he asked, "You said your name was Sullivan, right?"

         "Yup!" The grin the dragon gave him was enough to make him grin as well.

         "Well Sullivan, I know this is a bit sudden, since we just met and all, but would be willing to... I don't know, coach me on this or something?"

         Sullivan scratched his chin. "Dunno about that. I've been pretty busy workin' to get my bachelor's the last couple years. But look, I can't tell you if it's worth it for ya or not. All you can really do is take a shot and see what happens. But y'know, I got a feeling you're gonna enjoy yourself."

         Ray didn't respond at first. It wasn't exactly the help he was looking for, and the encouragement felt a bit on the mild side. Still, Sullivan was a gainer, and he seemed happy. Infectiously happy, even. It was one thing to read about guys fattening up on purpose online, but to meet such a guy in real life...

         "Alright," Ray said, "I'll give it a shot. Thanks for stuff."

         Sullivan chuckled. It was a low rumble, but it held the same jovial note. "No problem, buddy. You seem like a pretty cool guy. Hey, wanna exchange numbers?"

------

         True to Sullivan's word, the couch proved to be a tight fit for the two. They weren't cramped, per se, but they didn't have much in the way of elbow room. Not that it mattered to either of them; it just made cuddling that much easier. Sully's tail was wrapped around Ray, and would occasionally tickle his belly with its tip. Ray didn't really mind. He was content to just lean on his big, fat dragon and trail a finger over his rolls of fat. With a happy hum, the Raichu morph opened his eyes and smiled at his boyfriend.

         "Whatcha thinkin' about?" Sully asked, smiling back.

         "Just remembering the day we met." Ray sighed. "It feels like so long ago."

         "Tell me about it. Hard to believe how small we used to be, eh?"

         Ray snorted. "Small by our current standards, maybe. But yeah, it's weird looking at old photos." He turned himself over and lay his head on Sully's gut. "Anyway, what do you wanna do later?"

         The Salamence morph grinned. "Actually..."
1211112121.title: A Moment to Reminisce

12111121211.content:
Ray's ears perked up. "Really?"

         "Yup!" Sully patted the Raichu's head.

She knew she couldn’t do it alone, she would definitely need help if she seriously wanted to gain. There would be no way she could tell Wendell what she had planned to please him either, it would make her look kind of desperate wouldn’t it? She wanted to show him how she really cared about him, but not just try and gain for his devotion. Hmm…maybe she would tell him she was thinking of gaining, he definitely seemed to have a knack for it she noted, as she watched his stomach slowly raise filing with more and more snacks.

Well, who else could help her? One person did immediately come to her mind, and as of right now she was definitely not on good terms with him. It was her big brother Ray. Ugh! She realized Ray too seemed to have the gift for gaining, remembering how he seemingly exploding with weight over the course of a single year! Her cheeks visibly began burning red at the thought of the embarrassment and teasing she’d probably get from him if she’d ask for help gaining. But still she would go through that and more if it meant she’d get to be together with Wendell and make him happy.

Soon the movie would be over, and she’d have to decide...well…it wasn’t an easy choice, but she would
12121221.title: Big Love & Conflicted Conscious

I just want to be with you and I am willing to do anything to be with you. I mean, sorry that sounded a bit desperate but I just can't get enough of you," she told him as she blushed deeply.

12122.title: The Gain begins

122.content:
Craig was basically your average teenage Charizard. He got good grades in high school, had a bunch of friends, and was going off to college soon. However, there was one aspect to Craig's being that set him apart from most of his species.

Craig was quite large for a Charizard. Quite large.

First of all, he had always been tall for his species. While most of his breed was around 5'9" to 6', Craig measured in at an astounding 6'7". His height itself had always been enough to make him stand out, but his weight helped greatly in making people notice him. The average Charizard is said to weigh about 200 lbs. Well, at the time of his graduation, Craig was tipping the scales at an impressive 486 lbs. He was quite flabby. His gut arced out from underneath his nicely-endowed chest and cascaded down his midsection, which would wobble from side to side with each step he took. His arms and legs were proportionally padded, and even his long charizardian neck had been swallowed up by the flab he's put on over the years. Even through his clothes, his flabbiness was noticeable.

The cause of this was simple enough: Craig loved to eat. Whenever he had the opportunity to eat, he would exploit it to the fullest he could. It wasn't like he was greedy or selfish in character--one would actually say that Craig's personality was more fitting for a smaller body type. But even though his personality was as so, he could never leave even the smallest scrap of food on his plate. Eating was one of the few things that Craig simply found aesthetically pleasing.

Of course, his parents always tried to keep his eating under control. They always made eating a dinner time activity only, and made sure they didn't eat at buffets very often. Buffet trips tended to be long and tedious--for Craig could eat long after his family was finished. When Craig ate out with his friends, they made sure to give him a specific amount of money that he could spend--and being the good kid he was, he always obeyed.

But now, Craig was all done with High School. He was moving on in his life--going off to College. He had gotten into a very prestigious school--which happened to be quite a ways away. Craig would be starting life without his parents around--he would have to fend for himself, make new friends, and make his own decisions.

----

The car pulled in as Craig's family arrived at Nationwide University. It had taken a good two days to get there, and everyone was quite exhausted. Craig's mother told him that she and his father and brother would probably stick around and check out the town before they left.

"This doesn't mean we're going to stick around, however," Craig's mother firmly stated. "You're off on your own now. You understand that?"

Craig grinned. "Yes, mom, I understand." In reality, Craig was itching to get out of the grasp his parents had kept on him. They weren't tyrannical or anything, of course. He was just eager to be on his own.

"All right then... lets get your stuff out."

So Craig and his family unloaded all of their luggage and unloaded in Craig's new dorm room. He was in the Rocky Tower, room 416. They finished unloading, and Craig gave his emotionally declining mother a flabby good-bye hug. He walked with them out to the car, and they left. For good.

Craig let go a sigh of relief. He was on his own now! He could basically do whatever he wanted. He held his chubby head high, and strutted off to orientation.

However, on the way to orientation, he happened to catch a whiff of something... well, edible. He turned his head in the direction the scent was coming from, and found himself staring into the doors to the school cafeteria. His stomach immediately began rumbling.

<i>Erk...</i> he thought to himself. <i>I'm so hungry... but I need to go to orientation... but I'm so hungry!</i> Turns out that Craig would be facing a decision in which he would soon find very frequent. What does he do?
122.title: The Freshman 15 (or 50... or 500...)

choices: he decides to muster his courage and talk to her

He ate sandwhiches,tacos,burgers,noodles,and other things and he kept eating until something caught his eye.It was another student but it was a Nidoqueen morph but she was huge and he couldn't take his eyes ooff her and then...
1221.title: Eating

12211.content:
And what a large Nidoqueen she was. As she moved slowly across the cafeteria, you could see her massive bulk swaying from side to side. For the first time, Craig had met someone larger than himself! She must have easily weight 500 lbs-- her expansively wide gut gently enveloped her lap and came down to her knees, with two consequently voluptuous breasts atop it. Her walking was impaired by her size-- she had to waddle to and fro because her thighs where so inhibited by their size. With each step she took, her whole body jiggled under the belly exposing top she wore, and her padded tail lazily swayed from side to side. Craig got a little jittery as he realized that she was heading his way.

"Excuse me, are you an incoming freshman?"
Craig looked up at her. "Er, yes..."

She smiled and extended a chubby paw. "Well, let me be the first to welcome you to the school. My name's Eileen."

Craig put down his sandwich and stood up to accept the handshake. In doing so, however, he found his own belly gently sink into hers, before quickly shifting to the side to avoid making that moment even more awkward.

"Er, hi," Craig stammered. "My name's Craig. Nice to meet you!" He flashed a bit of a shy grin.
"Nice to meet you too. I see you're having a bit of a pre-orientation snack," she said with a grin.
"Er, yeah..." Craig stammered as he looked down at the pile of empty plates on the table in front of him. "I was hungry..."

Eileen laughed. "Hah, can't tell you how many times I've done the same thing."

Craig's face brightened. "Really?"
"Oh sure." replied Eileen. "In fact, this was the first place I headed my freshman year as well. I've always appreciated a good meal." She grinned, and patted her gut. It rippled in agreement.
"Heh," Craig chuckled, "it's nice to meet someone else who appreciates food like I do."

Eileens demeanor instantly changed from cheerful to shocked. "Are you calling me fat?" she said, completely aghast.

About three or four seconds passed which, to Craig, felt like a year each.

"Er..."

With this, Eileen exploded in laughter. "Just kidding! Oh sorry, I do that to everyone."

Craig just kind of stared shocked, for a second, then joined in with the laughter.

"Hehe, sorry about that. I guess you'll soon find that I'm a bit of a jokester." Eileen chuckled. "I'm one of the few girls you'll ever meet who is proud to be large."

Craig grinned. "That's awesome," he replied.

Eileen grinned back. "So what's your major?"
"Oh, I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking something in computer sciences... what about you?"
"Me? Culinary Arts. As if you couldn't tell." She chuckled.
"Oh, sweet. I was thinking about doing that as a minor myself. What year are you?" Craig asked.
"I'm a Sophomore." she replied. "Actually, you should head over to orientation so you can sign up for your classes before it's too late. It's really hard to get things straightened out here if you miss that."
"Oh, yeah, right." Craig replies. "Er... can you tell me how to get there?"
"Oh, sure, just follow me."

The two of you head off, Eileen leading the way. Anyone watching would probably grin at the sight of two very large people walking down the sidewalk, both jiggling profusely. The two of you arrive in the building and she says goodbye.

"Oh, actually," Eileen says before she leaves, "You want to hang out after you get all of this done? I could show you around and stuff."
"Oh, yeah, that'd be great!" Craig replies.
"Yeah, it's no problem at all! Meet me..."

Craig signed up for his classes, he didn't get everything he wanted because he skipped orientation, but he signed up for everything he needed.

1221111.content:
Craig looked at his watch, 5:00pm, it was only 15 min before he said he would meet Eileen at the cafeteria. Still unsure of his way around campus he took a little longer to trace his steps back to the cafeteria.

He arrived slightly late and saw an anxious looking Eileen standing outside the door. She was looking every which way trying to spot Craig, it wasn't long before she did, as a nearly 500lb charizard morph is pretty hard to miss.

She jumped (as much as a 500lb Nidoqueen can) and waved a pudgy paw as he approached, "There you are Craig!" She shouted, he belly still jiggling from the impact of landing after the jump, "I thought you might have gotten lost!"

"It just took me a bit longer to get back, did you want to eat something before we took a tour of the campus?" Craig asked.

"Why else would I ask to meet in a cafeteria if I didn't expect dinner silly?" She said with a giggle. Her stomach growled audibly, "See, it wants food! Come, on!"

She grabbed Craig's hand with both of hers and started to pull the charizard along with amazing force and speed for someone her size.

For them the all you can eat buffet style was heaven, they each made several trips back, each time filling a tray to capacity. As time dragged on a stack of dirty dishes had piled up next to both of them. They made a little small talk, but both of them concentrated on the food they were eating.

"Hooo.....boy I'm stuffed," Craig said as he ate one last bite of pie he had gotten as the last part of his dessert.

"You gonna eat all that skinny pants?" Eileen said as she pointed to the remaining pie.

"Go ahead, you can have it, Its been a long while since I was able to eat like that, and the first time Ive ever seen anyone keep up with me, let alone beat me," Craig said. He massaged his taut belly.

"Same...mmrrfff...for....mmrrff...me," She said, the piece of pie still in her mouth. She swallowed it and chugged the rest of her milk. "Ive never had a boy keep up with me," She said with a wink.

Craig checked his phone and it said 7pm. "Oh crap, if we wanna get this tour in we gotta go quick before it gets dark," He said as he tried to get up. He clutched his stomach as he tried to get up, "Oh...I think I ate too much, I don't wanna go walking around after eating that much....but it feels so good," He said, rubbing his expansive gut.

Eileen laughed loudly and poked his gut playfully. "Let me guess, you aren't usually allowed to eat that much, even though you want to?"

"Yea...."

"Same thing happened to me freshman year, but here I got to eat all I wanted, sure I gained some weight, but I got used to the portion size, you will too," She explained as she rubbed her belly.

"Well..." She said, blushing a little, "We do live in the same building, if you want to come and hang out in my room for a while your welcome to instead of taking a tour."

"You could meet my roommate, shes really cool too," Eileen continued, "By the way, have you met yours yet?"

"Met? I don't even know if I have a single or double yet, guess Ill find out when I go back," he replied.
1221111.title: Dinner Together

She grinned and looked back at him with a smirk, "Well, well, being quite forward aren't we? Don't worry, there'll be plenty of time for that later."

Craig blushed realizing what she meant and immediately got off her. "Its...not like that!" he stammered, embarrassed at what had just happened.

"Sure it is..." She said with a smug smile.

She lead Craig up the elevators and down a small hall until they arrived at a door decorated with clippings from various culinary magazines.

"Well, here we are, I can hear her inside, come on," She said. She opened the door and Craig saw...

1222.content:
Eventually, Craig came to the (surprisingly) level-headed decision that missing orientation could be a serious impediment in commencing his college career. So, with all the willpower he could muster, he fled the cafeteria doors and headed toward the auditorium.

In the auditorium, the director of the school said a few words of welcome and other information essential to the incoming freshman. He then instructed the class into the lobby, in which not only would class registration take place, but where there would be a small reception as well. That meant food!

Of course, Craig wasted no time in reaching the said food. The first thing he did was pile as many different snacks and hors d'oeuvres onto his plate as he could, as well as two slices of the chocolate "welcome" cake. Once he had enough to last him a walk to the class registration table, he strutted on over to sign up for his classes.

As Craig was scribbling the various classes he was signing up for, somebody behind him apparently spotted the keyring hanging out of his pocket that so boldly displayed his room: R416.

"Hey, you're in Rocky Tower, 416? I think I'm your room mate!"

Craig instantly wheeled around, his excess baggage sluggishly following. Behind him stands...
1222.title: Business Before Pleasure...

12221.content:
Craig was surprised to see that the person he'd be rooming with this year was just about the same size as he was.

The Dragonite was approximately the same hight as Craig, but that was normal hight for a Dragonite. But in terms of weight, the Dragonite was just about as overweight as Craig. Dragonites had always run a little heavy, but this fellow certainly abused the privilege! His belly distended a good ways from his abdomen, resting idly mid-way down his thighs. His chest was also well proportioned to his belly, and his arms and legs were also well padded. He had a very round, jovial face and his tail was thick enough to balance his hefty gut. If anything, he was a little bigger than Craig.

"The name's Lucian". The Dragonite extended a pudgy hand.

"I'm Craig," replied Craig. "Nice to meet you."

The two of them shook hands and exchanged nods of friendship. They talked for a bit, and found that they had a good few common interests and hobbies. When it came to the dorms, the school was pretty good about pairing students up based on common interests and had pretty good results when it came to roommates sticking together. They two of them were quite pleased to find that they had so much in common.

"Heh, I feel like the school was able to find me a roommate my size as well!" Craig blurted out. After realizing what he said, he brought his hand to his mouth. "Oh I'm sorry!" he exclaimed. "Shoot, I hope I didn't offend you!"

Lucian let out a jovial laugh "Ooh, not at all!" he replied reassuringly. "I've never had any bad qualms about my weight. I guess you could say I'm happy being fat!" Lucian slapped his gut, and it wobbled aesthetically in response.

"Whew, that's good." Craig let out a sigh of relief. "I guess you could say I'm the same way. I've always loved eating... guess all of this is just happy memories of the good times!" Craig grinned, and grabbed a roll of his own soft midsection.

"You too eh? Eating's always been a love of mine as well," replied the Dragonite. "Once I get going, I can't stop!"

"You too?!" exclaimed Craig. Things were going well enough already, and now his first friend in college was one of the only people he's ever met who's shared his eating habits. "Man, finally, somebody who's on my wavelength. Maybe they do factor in size when picking roommates!" Craig laughed, and Lucian joined in.

"Actually," Lucian chimed in, "do you want to go get dinner after this?"

Craig grinned even wider. "Definately! But where? The cafeteria's the only place I've seen here..."
12221.title: A Friend My Size

122212.content:
"No way dude, I know a great place nearby." Lucian responded. "Not only is the food there great, but it's my favorite kind of restaurant-- a buffet!"

Craig gawked a little bit when he heard the sound of that. A buffet? He rarely got to go to those! And there's one nearby? Oh my. It's good to be in college... Craig thought to himself. Needless to say, he agreed to go there instantly.

So when the day's events were over, Craig and Lucian walked over to the restaurant. It was a very nice restaurant. The seating area was very nicely done-- not too ritzy, but still very clean and well-managed. The buffet itself coasted about fifteen dollars-- a completely normal price for any respectable buffet. Yet, Craig and Lucian would be saving a lot of money by eating here.

The first time Craig walked to the buffet section of the restaurant, he almost fainted. He had never seen that much food in a contained area before in his life. Bins upon bins upon bins, piled high with the savory goodness of mashed potatoes and barbecued ribs and macaroni and cheese. Craig kept his gawking time to a minimum, however, and made sure he hurried up and began eating. He and Lucian both piled their plates high with food, and did not waste any time to get eating.



The two of them had to be eating for at least and hour straight. They must have gone through at least ten plates each in that time. They both ate until they literally could not eat any more. Craig completely lost himself in the meal-- everything he ate just tasted so delicious. It was all so rich-- the cooks were certainly very generous with the amount of butter they used in their dishes. As Craig rubbed his taught and visibly distended gut, he sighed a sigh of jubilation. He hadn't eaten like that in years.

Needless to say, it was a difficult walk home.

"Man... I really stuffed myself today..." stated Lucian, having difficulty dragging himself down the sidewalk.
"Erf- no kidding," replied Craig, who was in the same predicament. "So did I. I haven't eaten that much in ages!"
"Yeah... I wish I ate like that more often..." thought Lucian out loud.

And then a light went off.

"Hey, I just.. had an idea..!" Stammered Lucian in between gasps.
"Wuzzat?"
"We should.. have a contest!"
Craig was confused. "A contest?"
"Yeah!" Exclaimed Lucian. "We should have..."
122212.title: First Binge Away from Home

"Prize?" The bloated Dragonite thought for a moment. Suddenly, an idea came to his mind. "Whoever loses has to pay for the other's meals for a week."
Craig thought about it for a moment. If he lost, he could end up paying hundreds of dollars. Of course, if he won, then he could eat as much as he wanted for free. Eventually, he decides...

Craig smiled and had a idea and cuckles some. "I got a beter idea for the prize, loser not only pays for the winner's meal for a week but loser also has to obay the winner for the smister like a slave but not you know forced to like do stuff that could get us into truble. Sound fun buddy?"

Lucian just smiled at him more and chuckles back, "I have to say that does sound like a good idea Craig, I like it but why stop there? Loser also has to feed the winner all the food they can hold each meal for the ime they are roomies together. How is that idea?"

Craig was shocked and happy at the same time, a slave and feeding if he wins, how could he say no but he still found it lacking something. "I love the sound of that and I still want to make it better, maybe loser also has to rub the winner's fat on comand, and maybe gains weight only when the winner says they can, and maybe also have the winner diside when to let the losser out of the bet? I still think something is missing, maybe the loser can also have to keep the winner gaining each day? I don't know something is missing but that's the bet as it stands. Deal then Lucian?" Holds out his hand and waits for him to shack it when...
12221212.title: to make the contest for fun instead.

Just once, the loser has to kiss the winner on the lips.
122212121.content: What's Craig got in mind?
122212121.title: Sweetening the Deal a Bit More

1222121212.content:
"Well, if you can't think of anything else..." Lucian extended his hand toward Craig's, only to have the latter pull his away.

         "Wait, I just thought of something!" Craig twiddled his fingers. Whether it was out of mischievousness or nervousness, not even he was sure.

         Raising an eyebrow, Lucian lowered his hand and smirked at his roommate. "Oh yeah? Are you gonna tell me what it is?"

         "Well, uh... It, um... The loser... Y'see..." Craig kept twiddling his fingers. Said twiddling gave way to snapping as he went silent. After a bit, he rubbed the back of his head and grinned sheepishly. "Ah, shoot. Yknow what? I just forgot."

         If there was a change in Lucian's mood, he didn't show it. "You forgot what you were just about to say."

         "Er, yeah."

         "In the same minute you thought it up."

         "Uh-huh."

         Lucian chuckled, causing his belly to jiggle the tiniest bit. "Yeah, I don't blame ya. I lose my train of thought on a stuffed gut, too. Something tells me you're gonna run into this a lot in the upcoming years."

         "Most likely," Craig muttered, the sheepish grin still plastered on his face. "Why don't we just keep heading back for now? Maybe I'll remember by the time we get there."

         "Works for me." With a shrug and a grunt, Lucian turned around and resumed hauling himself down the sidewalk, with Craig following close behind. Silence fell between the two as they focused on lugging their stomachs back to their room.

         Well, Lucian probably was. Craig was preoccupied thinking about other things.

         Figures I'd chicken out. I mean, we've only just met, and I can't even tell if he'd do that kind of stuff with another guy. And if I do bring it up, then what? Would he be up for it? Would he be willing to give me a chance? Hell, would he even take my idea seriously? Dammit, if we're such kindred spirits, why can't I just read his mind?!

         Craig didn't consider himself gay, in a manner of speaking. He didn't even have a real preference when it came to gender. He did, however, have a preferred body type. The hefty bulk that came with the Charizard's eating habits was one of the best things he could ever ask for. The softness, the various folds of flab he just loved to play with, the way it all weighed him down and gave him a wonderful feeling he could never describe... It was no wonder he felt attraction to other fat 'morphs. The deliciously plump Dragonite in front of him was no exception. Though his huge gut wasn't quite large enough to be seen from behind, Craig could still picture it in all its rotundness. Or he would, if it weren't for the glorious buttocks demanding his attention, even with the large tail sandwiched between them trying to get in the way.

         I'll bet anything those beauts would be the best pillows ever. I'd love to tell him that just to see his reaction. If I could just be open with him...

         The city around Craig was nothing more than a blurry backdrop at that point. All of his attention was on Lucian, and not even the strain of his taut gut could distract him. It was obvious from the way the Dragonite moved that he was used to stuffing himself silly. The untrained eye might have missed it, but Craig was no uncultured buffoon. He had no trouble seeing the subtle grace with which Lucian carried his bulk. Craig could just imagine his new friend unclothed, his flab on display for all to see.

         The world around them all but vanished as they continued along. It wasn't all that important. Of course, how could anything be more important than the suddenly naked Lucian before him? Every last curve was on full display, jiggling and bouncing with every step he took. Craig could feel that fat calling out to him, begging to be rubbed and played with. A tempting offer, but Craig was no slave to his desires. He could make do with admiring from afar and--

         "No need to be so shy, big boy."

         Craig's heart skipped a beat. Did Lucian really just... No, there's no way. Surely he wouldn't be openly flirting with a guy he just met. His sudden and inexplicable nudity couldn't be anything more than Craig's imagination getting the best of him. And so was that saucy over-the-shoulder look Lucian was giving. A bit tame as far as sexy daydreams went, but it was enough for the walk back. Now if only that tail would stop getting in the way of that luscious ass.

         Dream Lucian smirked. "Tsk tsk, Craig. So shameless. But if that's what you want..."

         It took some self restraint on the Charizard's part to not lick his lips as Lucian raised his tail so very, very slowly. Craig's heart hammered away in his chest. For a moment, he pondered if the real Lucian was this sadistic. Said moment was short-lived thanks to the dreamed-up Dragonite finally exposing his butt in its entirety. The sight of those twin orbs unobstructed made Craig's mouth water. Swallowing back the saliva, he marveled at their roundness, at their size, at the way they jiggled with each step. Yes, they would make for excellent pillows. Just fluff them up a little (or a lot, if he so desired) and everything would be perfect.

         Dream Lucian chuckled. "And these 'pillows' could be all yours if you'd just open up. C'mon, big boy, don't be shy. I won't bite too hard. You can trust a fellow fatty, right Craig? Craig? You with me, dude?"

         "Huh...?" Craig blinked. "What's up?"

         "I said we made it to Rocky Tower." Lucian gestured with his thumb at the building behind him. Craig looked up and, sure enough, the words "ROCKY TOWER" were written above the entrance.

         "Oh." Craig forced a chuckle. "So we are."

         Just like before, Lucian raised an eyebrow and smirked at him. "Zoned out a bit, I take it?" Craig's only response was to blush. "Ah, don't worry about it. I kinda get lost in thought sometimes, too. Keeps my mind off how overstuffed I am.

         "Speaking of stuffing, did you remember that other term you thought of?"

         It felt like a rock landed in Craig's stomach. He gulped. "Um... Y-yeah. Yeah, I did."

         The Dragonite nodded. "Cool. So, what'd you think of?"

         "Well..." Biting his lip, Craig mustered every once of willpower he could and looked his roommate in the eyes. "My idea was, um... I was thinking that whoever loses should give the winner a... a kiss. On the lips. For a full three seconds."

         Lucian's expression was completely unreadable. No smirk, no scowl, not even a raised eyebrow. The rock in Craig's stomach was starting to feel more like a boulder. A sudden panic gripped at him.

         "B-but we don't need to use that term if you don't want to!" Craig blurted out. "I mean, this contest was your idea in the first place, so you get the final say on everything!" His courage spent, the Charizard averted his gaze to his gut, rubbing it nervously. Silence hung in the air for what Craig could swear was half an eternity.

         I totally blew it, didn't I?

         "Alright."

         Craig looked back up at Lucian. The Dragonite gave him what he assumed was a reassuring smile.

         "Loser has to kiss the winner on the lips for three seconds. Just no tongue, okay?"

         Craig tried to respond, but no words came out of his mouth. He settled for a smile of his own--which was no doubt exceedingly grateful--and a nod. Without another word, the two entered Rocky Tower and made their way up to their room. There was no doubt Lucian had some questions, but he seemed willing to save them until the next day, which Craig was grateful for. After all, what better way to handle a stuffed gut than to sleep it off?

------

The following day, back at the buffet...

         The two sat opposite each other, their plates stacked with whatever they could fit on them. Lucian was giving Craig a cool stare, though the Dragonite couldn't help but grin. Craig gave a grin of his own and drummed his fingers on the table. He could only assume it was a mix of nervousness and excitement. Competing with a fellow glutton in an eating contest was a new experience, and Lucian was sure to give him a run for his money if yesterday was anything to go by.

         Lucian cleared his throat. "Alright, let's go over things one more time. We'll fill our plates up with as much food as we can and then eat them clean. No going for more until we've eaten our entire helping. There's no time limit, so we don't need to rush each other, but neither of us can stop until we feel like eating anymore. Obviously, whoever eats the most helpings is the winner.

         "Now for the actual bet: first, the loser has to pay for the winner's meals for a week. Second, the loser must also act as the winner's slave for the semester, assuming the demands are reasonable and won't cause trouble. Third, for as long as we're roomies, the winner will have the loser stuff them as much as possible for each meal. Fourth, the winner may command the loser to rub his fat as he pleases. Fifth, the loser can't gain any further weight without the winner's permission. Sixth, the loser has to help the winner gain at least one pound per day. Seventh, only the winner can decide when to relieve the loser of all these conditions.

         "And finally..." Lucian paused for a split second. "Finally, the loser will have to kiss the winner on the lips for three seconds. Did you get all that?" Craig nodded. "Good. Now that we got all the formalities outta the way, let's get to eating!"
1222121212.title: A Long-Kept Secret, Finally Revealed

choices: Suddenly, Lucian pulls him in and kisses him again. Harder.
Okay, that's done. Now for Craig's belly rub.
12221212122.content:
There had to be some technique to Lucian's stuffing, Craig decided. No way that doughy Dragonite could've outdone the ten plates' worth they each had yesterday without some sort of secret trick.

         "Ooooogh..."

         Despite his best efforts, Craig only managed to just barely match the ten plates he ate yesterday. If there was anything to take away from this contest, it's that one binge the day before wasn't enough to up his max capacity. His nearly distended, drum-tight stomach made sure he understood that. Maybe this was why his parents never let him go overboard...

         Craig groaned again as he tried to push himself up from his reclining position. The walk back was going to be even worse this time, no doubt. Maybe they'd be able to stick around the buffet for a while and nurse their guts for a few hours.

         Nah, probably not. They'd get kicked out for loitering. Having given up on moving for the moment, the Charizard peered over his belly at Lucian. He looked to be in the same state, though maybe not quite as out of it. A little preoccupied with rubbing his gut, but he didn't have a glassy look in his eyes.

         "Ngh... Lucian?" No response. "Lucian? Hey, Lucian. You still with me?" This time, he managed to get a grunt out of the Dragonite. "I think we should get goin'. Management probably won't let us hang around here. C'mon, I'll give you a belly rub, if you want. Should help with digesting."

         Lucian looked up at Craig, but said nothing. He just nodded after a moment, and slowly pulled himself out of the booth. Craig tried to do the same, but winced when he pressed against the table. Thankfully, Lucian offered a hand in slipping him out. Craig leaned against his roommate, putting an arm over his shoulder. To Lucian's credit, he managed to haul the two of them out the door with something resembling grace.

         "Alright," the tubby dragon finally said, "let's get back to our room so you can give me that rub. I'll give ya one back when you're done."

         "You don't have to. You won."

         "Yeah, I know." He grunted as he pulled Craig up from his growing slouch. "But I wanna. It's the least I could do for you, Loser."

         Craig snorted. "Whatever you say, Winner." He smirked. "Nice to know you won't be a total ass to your slave."

         Lucian smirked back. "I think you'll find I'm pretty reasonable master."

         A brief lull in the conversation passed. Then, Craig asked, "So how'd you manage to put down twelve plates today?"

         "Thirteen."

         "Wow, no kidding? Now I really wanna know how you did it. You only got through ten yesterday!"

         Lucian pulled up the slouching Charizard again, then chuckled. "Well, if you want the truth, I actually wanted to have an eating contest with you the moment we met. I wasn't sure how good you are, so I decided to take you to the buffet and match your eating so you wouldn't be too scared to take me on."

         Craig playfully swatted him with his tail. "Oh, you sneaky bastard!" Despite his words, he couldn't help but grin. "You wanted a personal slave that badly, huh?"

         "That was your idea, remember?"

         "Wha-? Oh, yeah, that's right... W-well, it doesn't really matter who came up with what, right?"

         Lucian chuckled again. "Sure, Craig. Sure."

------

         Apparently, Lucian was already comfortable enough with Craig that he had no issue with burping around him, judging by the three successive belches he just let out. The Dragonite was leaning back on his bed, his shirt pulled up so as to leave his gut unobstructed. Craig was kneeling down in front of him, massaging away at the turgid orb while ignoring the strain of his own.

         "Ahh, that's the stuff," Lucian remarked before letting loose another belch. "You sure know your way around a belly. You practice on yourself a lot?"

         "Maybe," Craig muttered, blushing. He considered himself more of a belly kneader than masseuse. Given his lack of chances to pig out back home, his own soft belly was far more familiar than someone else's rock hard one.

         "Well, now you're gonna put all that practice to good use, 'cause you're gonna give me a belly rub after every meal. And don't even think of weaseling your way outta this, not that--ooh, that's nice, keep doing that--not that you actually would."

         Craig just blushed harder as he mixed more scratching in with his rubbing. Maybe it would've been better to never suggest that kiss in the first place if Lucian was just going to tease him like this.

         Come to think of it, when did Lucian plan on having Craig kiss him anyway? He had no problem with ribbing the poor Charizard about his attraction, obviously, but what was on his mind? He could just be putting it off to make fun of Craig as long as he could. They never said anything about having a time frame for it, so it could end up being anytime between today and the time they moved out of the dorm. Hell, given Lucian had full control of their little arrangement and could call things off whenever he wanted, he could just skip out on the kiss entirely.

         A pat on the head made Craig freeze. "Okay, buddy," said Lucian, "I think that's enough. You did a good job. Great, even. Now how 'bout you get up here and sit next to me? You look like you're about to bury your face in my gut."

         Craig jerked away instantly, wincing at the pain in his stomach from the sudden shift. Blushing harder still, he stood up and sat down next to his laughing roommate. The laughter died down, though Lucian looked everywhere but at Craig.

         "Sooo..."

         "Hmm?" Craig's head tilted.

         "I think, uh..." The Dragonite drummed his fingers on his belly. "I think it, um, might be better to, uh...y'know, to get that kiss over with."

         Craig gulped. "Are you sure? 'Cause you can, well, you can call it off if you want."

         Lucian shook his head. He finally turned to look Craig in the eyes. "You already gave me a chance to say no, and I didn't take it, so go ahead and kiss me. Three seconds on the lips, just like you wanted."

         Craig's heart hammered away in his chest. This is it, he thought. He leaned forward slowly, less than an inch at a time. His eyes never left Lucian's face for a second. The Dragonite had no discernible emotion on his face. Craig couldn't help but envy his poker face, as he could feel the nervousness showing on his. Lips quivered as they parted, eyes slowly closing. Almost there, just a little closer and they'd make contact. Eyes shut completely, lip puckered, and...

         Contact was established. No reaction from Lucian. Was his face still just as stoic as it was a second ago?

         One...

         Neither dared to move nor breathe. It was as though time itself froze on the spot, or the world faded away and they were all that remained.

         Two...

         His fingers yearned to reach out and run themselves over the Dragonite's gloriously globular body, but he abstained. His lips desired to remain where they were for as long as he could, only willing to move when he needed air, but...

         And three.

         The connection was severed almost immediately, though Craig was slow to properly pull away. His breathing slowly returned, and his eyes warily opened, the first thing he saw Lucian's still stoic face.
12221212122.title: Always Someone Better

choices: No way, that ass needs loving ASAP!
122212121221.content:
Without warning, Lucian gripped the sides of Craig's head and pulled him in. Craig barely had enough time to register what was happening when their lips mashed together. The shock left him motionless, but Lucian held him so firmly that he couldn't have moved anyway. This wasn't the plain kiss they shared seconds ago, either. This one was intense, hungry for passion.

         Once it finally registered in Craig's mind, his wide eyes slowly shut, and he began to push back. Lucian moaned with approval and removed his hands to wrap his arms around Craig, who responded in kind. Craig winced at his stuffed belly getting squished between them, but he didn't care. He was finally kissing a fellow fatty, and it was better than anything he'd ever dreamed.

         Holy shit, holy shit, holy shit! I'm, I'm kissing him! He's kissing me! We're kissing! I can't believe we're really doing this! And he's so good! Oh my god, is he gonna use his tongue? Should I use my tongue? Should I even be thinking about tongue right now? Maybe I should ask him; he seems like an expert on this stuff. Aw man, this is way better than three seconds. This is the kind of kiss I'd keep up fore-- Oh crap, need air...

         They finally broke apart. How long did it last? Ten, twenty, thirty seconds? A full minute? All Craig knew, as he panted and tried to relax his rapidly beating heart, was that he wanted more of it. His cheeks burned fiercely, the bright red blush no doubt showing even through his scales. He opened his eyes to see Lucian smiling at him. Was he blushing too, or was it just Craig's imagination?

         Lucian chuckled. "I had a feeling I'd like you. Never thought it'd go this smoothly."

         "Huh...?"

         "Was this your first time kissing a guy?"

         "Uh..." Craig couldn't pull his mind away from the fact they were still embracing.

         Lucian snorted. "I'll just save the questions for later. 'Til then, how 'bout that belly rub?"

         His brain still feeling like mush, Craig could only bring himself to nod.

------

         With both the pressure in his stomach and the shock of their second kiss gone, Craig found it much easier to pay attention to Lucian's questions. Which were coming out of his mouth. Through his lips. Which kissed him.

         Okay, maybe the focus wasn't entirely there.

         Lucian snapped his fingers in Craig's face a few times. "C'mon, big guy, stay with me here."

         "Wha-?" Craig shook his head. "S-sorry, what were you saying?"

         "I asked if you've never kissed a guy before today."

         "O-oh, uh..." Craig glanced around the room. "Well, to be honest, I've never...actually kissed...anyone before. Like, at all."

         Lucian raised an eyebrow and grinned. "So I'm your first, huh?" Craig blushed and nodded slowly. Lucian's grin widened. "Alright then, how's it feel having a guy like me kiss you?"

         Licking his lips, Craig stared down at his belly. When he was sure his heartbeat wouldn't be settling down anytime soon, he took a deep breath and looked back to Lucian. "You're, well, you're everything I ever wanted in a first kiss. You're fat, you love being fat, and you... I don't know, you just feel 'right'."

         "Right, huh?" Lucian leaned back a bit and stared up at the ceiling. "We only just met the other day, y'know. It's a little too soon to decide if we're soulmates or not."

         "I-I know that! Just..." Craig squeezed his belly. "I just think you're a good first time. Even if we never kiss again-- "

         "'Never kiss again'?!" Lucian laughed, causing his body to jiggle, and slipped an arm around Craig's back. "Buddy, we can kiss as much as you want! I didn't challenge you to an eating contest just to kiss your ass, y'know!"

         "Huh? Then why?"

         He scratched his gut. "Well, when you told me how much you loved to eat, I might've thought I could seduce you with my awesome stuffing skills."

         "Wait, wait, back up a bit. I think I'm missing something here."

         "Aw, c'mon, it's not that hard to figure out."

         Craig gave him a pointed look. "Humor me."

         Lucian rolled his eyes. "You're not the only one who gets the hots for fatties."

         Realization struck Craig. "So, you're saying... Holy shit."

         Lucian's grin turned almost predatory. "Yup. Big boys like you drive me wild, Craiggie, and I've got you all to myself." He leaned in until his snout was less than an inch away from Craig and whispered, "What about you? Do I drive you wild?"

         Craig shivered. "Y-yeah."

         "How wild?"

         "I-I, I imagined you naked last night."

         "Did you imagine me doing anything interesting? I bet you did."

         Craig gulped. "I imagined you showing off your big, fat ass." Feeling a strange sense of bravery, he continued, "I wanted to touch it so badly."

         "Reeeeaaaally." Lucian pressed his body against Craig's side, earning another shiver. "In that case, maybe we should get a little more hands-on tonight. What do you say?"

         Craig let out a shuddering breath. His whole body was shaking. Then, to both his relief and disappointment, Lucian eased off of him.

         "Then again, maybe I'm pushing things a bit. You don't seem all that ready for this. We can slow things down if you want."

         Rather than the mischievous glint he expected, Craig turned to find genuine concern in Lucian's eyes. He smiled.
122212121221.title: Surprise, He Digs You Too!

1222122.content:
"A gaining contest?" you ask.
"Yeah!" answers Lucian. "I dunno, guess I've always been a little competitive. But I think it could be fun! I mean, we both eat tons, we're both big guys... let's see who can become the biggest!"

The more he thought about it, the more Craig liked this idea. There was never much he could compete in, especially when it came to sports. It would be great to be the one with bragging rights for a change!

"You're on." Craig grinned.

"Awesome!" exclaimed Lucian. "We'll weigh ourselves first, and keep track of how much we weigh at the end of every, lets say, month or so. We'll see who's had the greatest gain by the end of the semester."

Craig extends his hand. "Deal."

The two of them shake, and head to the bathroom to find a scale. Craig weighs himself first, and finds himself a little more than the last time he weighed himself--491 lbs. Of course, much more was to be expected of the Dragonite--his breed weighed on average almost as much as Craig did now, so needless to say Lucian's weight was already way ahead of Craig's. Lucian clocked in at 667 lbs.

"All right." stated Lucian. "May the hungriest win!"

-----

The two of them do what they're best at voraciously for one month. Each meal they shared becomes an eating contest, they both find themselves having meals both on and off campus--for each meal of the day, and both of them are snacking every chance that they get. The growth is definitely noticable--Craig continues to notice his clothing getting tighter on him, while Lucian notices his bed protest more and more each night. Luckily, this fierce competition hasn't been impeding school.

Finally, the end of the month comes around, and it's time to weigh in. Who's winning so far?
1222122.title: Battle of the Gluttons

choices: Lucian takes it and eats it
12221221.content:
After one month of eating, eating, eating, and eating, it was already time for Craig & Lucian to weigh in. Both guys had packed on a considerable amount of blubber, but only one would be bigger.

Lucian was first. He waddled up to the scale and heaved his fat body onto the platform. The dials turned...to read 876 pounds, a gain of over 200 pounds in just one month!

"Wow, I really gained a lot!" Lucian smiled, his dozen or so neck rolls jiggling.

"It's my turn now." Craig heaved his own blubbery self and watched the dials turn.

When they finally stopped, they registered Craig's weight at 990 pounds.

"Hey, that's over twice my weight!" the Charizard smiled.

Lucian poked Craig's massive belly.

"Hehe, you're getting really fat, PIGGY!"

Craig lifted up & dropped his gut. He looked great in the mirror, a big, round ball of orange flab.

"Man, I got huge! I wonder how big I'll be before the semester ends."

The tubby 'zard found a strange, food-looking ball in one of his rolls upon rolls of fat.

"Hmmm...forgot what this was..."
12221221.title: Craig the Pig

choices: Go back to the dorm to relax after the feast

The taste was so delighting that Craig was drooling. As the time came to go to their buffet they headed off. As they got to the buffet Craig felt different ,but ignored the feeling. As they went to go pay for their meal Craig was ready to eat and let Lucian pay. When Lucian was finishing paying he saw Craig eating like crazy. Lucian responded, "Holy shit man how much have you eaten already!" Craig answered while food is in his mouth, "I re ...ally don't...know." Lucian started to eat with Craig. Craig was just shoving everything down. After thirty minuets of gorging they left with full bellies. Rubbing his stomach, Craig decided it was time for him to leave. Getting up, he made his way towards the exit. He didn't even bother re-buttoning his pants again that night. The immense size of his own stomach kept it from falling anyway.

"I hope you come back very soon." said the voice.

Upon arriving back to his room, he saw Lucian still asleep on his bed. Spotting the weighing scale on the side, he shrugged his shoulders and heaved himself onto it. He could barely see the dials spin, having to lean forward to see past his humongous ball of a belly. The dials finally stopped, making Craig drop his jaws again.

"1015 lbs!? But, that's gotta be a 25lbs gain from a single feast!"

Craig grabbed a hold of his chunky flesh and jiggled it. It was soft and it felt nice in his fingers.

"Well, it's not like I'm complaining..."

Finally getting tired, he slowly got into bed, which groaned loudly underneath the blob of a pokemon. After playing with his belly just a little more, just for the heck of it, Craig closed his eyes and instantly fell asleep.
-----
The next day, Craig was the first one to wake up. Yawning a bit, his stomach followed afterwards with a loud gurgle of hunger.

"Heheheh, I wonder what's gonna be breakfast for you, my friend." Craig said, patting his padded midsection.

It didn't take long until Lucian woke up himself. Rubbing his eyes, he greeted Craig in his friendly manner.

"Hey there Craig...Say, have you gotten bigger?"

"Yeah, I sure have! Or are you just forgetting what happened yesterday?"

The two laughed a little as they got dressed and got ready to go to their usual buffet restaurant.

122212212.content:
Craig looked at what he found in his rolls of fat. It looked and felt like a large ball of dough.
"Hmmm... what's this? I don't remember..." he thought to himself.
"Hey Craig, whatcha got there?" Lucian said, as he swiped the ball from the ridiculously obese Charizard's paws. "You probably don't need this, seeing how fast you've grown this month. Besides, I need to step up my game," he said, as he ate the ball in one bite.
"Hey, why'd you do that?" Craig asked angrily. "I don't even know what that was."
"Well, you were holding it, so it had to be edible. Doesn't taste very good, though," the Dragonite replied. "It's like a pastry without any sugar in it."
Suddenly, an audible groan emitted from Lucian's stomach. He looked straight down to see his huge gut, or at least how much of it he could see with his chins in the way. "That's odd. I haven't felt this hungry since I started gorging myself for our contest," he thought to himself. His stomach continued growling. "Say, Craig, wanna head over to the buffet?"
"Right now? It's a bit early, don't ya think?" Craig looked at the clock. It was 3:30. Normally they didn't go down to the buffet until 5.
Lucian tried to play off his unusually large hunger. "Nah, it's a perfect time to go! We'll get there before most of the others start to arrive. Want me to call Conner so he can drive us over?"
"Well..." Craig thought about it for a moment. It didn't take long for him to realize that it was a dumb thing to think about, since they normally snacked on whatever they could find until a few minutes before they went to the buffet. Besides, it's not like they were really hungry when they did go. "Okay."

The two lard-asses hauled themselves downstairs (very carefully, so they didn't get themselves or anyone else stuck) to the parking lot, where they found Conner waiting for them. Conner was a Houndoom who, much like Craig and Lucian, loved to eat, and could even keep up with Craig and Lucian at the buffet before their gains really picked up. Strangely, however, his metabolism literally burned up anything he ate, leaving him fairly thin. Ever since the contest began, Conner had to drive Craig and Lucian to and from the buffet in his enormous yet surprisingly fuel-efficient van since they would regularly gorge themselves to the point where they'd be barely able to walk out of the restaurant. "Could you believe that the buffet actually started giving us discounts? You'd think that with us nearly closing them every day, they'd start charging us more!" the Houndoom joked.
"Yeah, yeah, whatever," Lucian mumbled, as his stomach started growling even more.
"Come on, can't you at least laugh a little? It's not often you hear a Dark type joking about something," Conner said.
"Sorry, it's just that I'm a bit anxious to get there, that's all."
"Okay then."

In a couple minutes, they were at the buffet. A Rhydon working there quickly noticed them, and hurried over to the main desk to flip over a sign saying "Shortage imminent."
Lucian waddled into the restaurant as fast as he could, trying to keep the smells of the buffet from driving him over the edge for now and nearly crashing into the desk. Craig and Conner followed.
The Bayleef at the desk was obviously a new worker, as she was very intimidated by the titanic dragon Pokemon looming over her. A Pelipper walking behind the desk whispered to her "They get a discount." "Seriously?" the Bayleef asked, turning around in an attempt to see who told her that. She sighed, and turned to the enormous Dragonite in front of her. "P-party of three?"
"Yes," Lucian replied, panting heavily from that short 'run'. The Bayleef fumbled at the cash register to find how much of a discount they would be getting, when she noticed that there was simply one button for discounts. "Th-that'll be thirty six d-dollars," she said.
As the three payed for their meals, she couldn't help but think to herself "How can we afford to feed them?"

Obviously, that ball of dough had some weird properties to it. It sped up Lucian's already black hole-like digestion process even more than the constant gorging did, leaving him hungrier than ever by the time he started filling his first plates with as much food as possible. However, just how much faster did it get? Will it just be enough to let him keep up with Craig, or will his new hunger take him to a new level of feasting?

1222211.content:
"Sure, I'll go with you," Craig said.
Brian seemed a bit surprised. "Alright. Let's go!"
As they walked to the gym, Brian talked to Craig about himself. At his high school, he had outclassed everyone in his school, except for one or two guys. He was pretty dedicated to weight lifting, and said that's he's worked out about twice a month since he was 8. He managed to bench press 3000 pounds one time, which astounded Craig. The thought of being able to move 3000 pounds made the obese Charizard twitch.
When they got to the gym, it was almost completely empty except for a Nidoking doing leg presses with over 1000 pounds. He didn't even bother to pay attention to the two giants who had just entered the gym. Brian walked towards a collection of dumbbells, where he grabbed two 300 pound ones and started doing curls. Meanwhile, Craig walked around to see all of the different machines.
One specific one caught his attention. It was the leg press machine that the Nidoking was using before. Interested in trying it, the obese Charizard sat in the seat, just barely fitting in it. In front of him, he could see a large steel plate. "I guess I'm supposed to put my feet on it," he thought to himself. After a little difficulty trying to bring his feet up due to the saddlebags of fat on his legs, he managed to get his feet on the plate, but his knees were bent almost uncomfortably. "What am I supposed to do now?" he thought. That's when he noticed that to the right of the plate, a few pictures showing how to use the machine were conveniently placed on a bar that was part of the machine. The pictures were of a stick figure that had gotten into the same position as Craig was in, and then started to push against the plate with its feet, moving a weight attached to the front of the machine. The figure would then bring its feet back to the point where the weight was almost at its starting position, but then would push it back out again. The instructions said to repeat the motion until the figure decided to stop, in which case it brought the plate back to its original position. Emulating what the stick figure had done, Craig started to push against the plate as hard as he could with his feet. His face started to turn red, and he started to sweat. Suddenly, he felt the weight move, which surprised him so much that he almost immediately dropped his feet. The weight slammed back into the machine with a loud clang. Craig brought his feet up again, and repeated the process, only this time, it was much easier. He brought his feet back to him, but not completely, then pushed out again. After three more reps, his legs felt too tired to move again, so he brought the weight back gently.
"Woah!"
Craig looked to his left. Brain was standing there, looking at him with complete shock. "Do you realize how much weight was on that thing?!" he asked.
"No," the Charizard responded. "I guess I didn't bother to check." At that, he got out of the seat, the machine creaking from the sudden removal of weight. He walked over to the front of the machine, but his legs wobbled as he walked. When he saw the front of the machine, he was amazed by the amount of weight on it. Each plate weighed 100 pounds, and there were 14 of them. He had just leg pressed 1400 pounds for 5 reps, and on his first time too!
"I expected that you'd have some decent leg strength from hauling yourself around all the time, but I never would have expected something like this," the giant Machoke said. "You should try the squat machine. You'll probably do pretty decently on that." However, Craig didn't really want stay. On the other hand, it would be interesting to see just how strong he really is. What did Craig decide to do?
