151.content:
Prism sighed contentedly, tilting her head back and basking in the warm sunlight on the beach. She was a tall Dragonair morph, and a total babe to boot. Large, full, perky breasts barely restrained by a green bikini-top that matched the light mint-green of her long hair, left free and sparkling, half from the ocean spray and half from her own luminescence. Her eyes were a sparkling blue, matching the crystalline orb protruding from her collar bone, one of the more distinctive marks of her species. Her narrow waist was interrupted buy a matching green bikini bottom hugging her shapely hips and luscious legs. Her long, lithe tail poked out of her back just above the fabric, winding its way to and fro along the length of her legs, the twin crystals near the tip resting on her ankles.

Then again, that’s how most people would imagine the CEO of a company that produces various body-altering chemicals to look, isn’t it?

Suddenly, a shadow loomed over Prism. She blinked open her eyes and smiled, looking up at her visitor. It was her bodyguard, a ripped Charizard morph named Pyris. Again, he looked like what you would expect an employee of the company would look like, but Pyris didn’t like using the chemicals, instead wishing to rely only on his own strength. Despite this fact, he still remained friends with Prism, despite the output of her company, though their friendship was a strange one at times. He slid his sunglasses down his red-orange snout, revealing his blue-green eyes. “Don’t you think you’ve gotten enough sun, miss?” he asked, a slightly serious tone in his voice.

Prism’s eyes trailed up and down her visitor’s body, pausing ever so briefly at the simple black shorts he wore. (Shorts, not trunks. Charizard + Swimming = “Umm…. No.”) “You look good in those. I ought to extend Casual Friday to the whole week.”

Pyris gave her a bit of a frumpled look. Yeah, he liked her, but he was also very protective of her, epically with some of the religious and special-interest groups that were… nonplussed by her company’s product. “I think we should get going,” he said matter-of-factly.

Prism pouted, her snout cutely showing a little frown. “Aww… Come on. When was the last either of us had any fun?”
151.title: Day at the beach

choices: …go some where more private for some… personal fun.”
…take some of our products and have some fun with the rest of the beach.”
1511.content:
Pyris sighed. “Allright, I guess a little extra time couldn’t hurt.” He leaned back, his large wings spreading out along the warm sand. Prism rolled onto one and rested her head on his chiseled chest, her feathery ear tickling him a bit. He wrapped his wing around her and sighed contentedly.

“Told ya,” Prism said with a smile, turning her head to look up at Pyris’ face. “…but you know what would make this even more fun?”

“Hmm? What?” Pyris asked, seemingly woken up from whatever small day dream he was having.

Prism’s eyes twinkled as she said, “Let’s…
1511.title: Why ruin a perfectly good beach scene?

choices: “Well…  Why don’t you come see for yourself?”
1512.content:
Pyris didn’t move an inch, his stare unwavering. Prism wilted away from his stare, her large white, wing-shaped ears, drooping. With a little bit of a sigh, Pyris dropped to a knee and ran a thick, knobby finger along the length of her forehead horn, and then he put it under her snout and raised it so they were looking into each other’s eyes. “Come on, you know I’m only looking out for you.”

Prism sighed a little and smiled, “… yeah, I know.” She took a hold of his hand and pulled herself up, picking up her bag with her tail. Arm-in-arm, the two morphs walked back to the car and Pyris drove the two back into the city.

***************************************************

An hour later, the two ‘morphs stepped into the ground floor of the company’s HQ, a tall skyscraper, the outer wall made completely of glass. Pyris excused himself and walked over to a security door, “I think you can handle yourself from here.”

Prism giggled and waved, “Ok. Seeya later, hunky!” She hurried off, nodding to the guard on duty and flashing him her ID from her bag, not like the CEO really needed it, but given the variable nature of her, or anyone’s for that matter, appearance, it was good practice. Prism stepped into the elevator and tapped the button. Just as the doors closed, a chubby, light blue paw snuck its way into the closing doors. Pushing them open, a plump Vapereon ‘morph dressed in a white lab coat stepped in, her short-cut blue hair framing her rounded face nicely. Her name was Victoria, and contrary to popular belief, she was the true brains behind the whole company.

She and Prism had met in high school, back when they were just an Eevee and Dratini morph respectively, and become fast friends, going to the same college, Victoria majoring in Chemistry, and Prism in marketing. One night during the spring semester, Victoria called her friend from one of the school’s chemistry labs. It was after hours; the Vaopreon ‘morph had been working late on a special project of hers. Prism bundled up and hurried over and discovered the weirdest thing she had ever seen. There was Victoria… just twice as tall as normal. She quickly explained that she was handling a bunch of chemicals when they spilled on her and… well, the result was fairly obvious. Suddenly, Victoria got a wicked case of hiccups and shrunk back to normal size. She sighed, thinking the worst was over, “Man, that was weird.”

“You’re telling me!” Prism retorted. She took a step forward and poked her friend’s shoulder, just making sure she was real.

“Hey, wait, there could be residue!” Victoria shouted, but it was too late. Prism moaned and doubled over, arms over her chest. Victoria kneeled down by her friend and saw what was happening to her. Prism’s chest was slowly swelling until her bosom had doubled in size.

Shaking, Prism got to her feet and looked down at her expanded breasts. She hefted one, moaning softly again at the sensation. The two friends looked at each other in silence for a while. Prism hefted her new “enhancements” in each hand and let them fall, smiling at the sensation of them bouncing against her torso. “You thinking what I’m thinking of, Vi?”

Thus began a beautiful partnership. Victoria kept experimenting with the chemicals until she could make the reactions consistent. Prism worked with other firms and the FDA to get the chemical marketed and approved. Now, just a few years later, the two were sitting on top of the most lucrative recreational drug on the market. True, some of the chemicals had to be “watered down”, so to speak; wouldn’t want cities being leveled by 100 foot tall pokemorphs, but there were plenty of precautions in place, such as police forces being given anti-drugs, and athletic groups given a very simple how-to for drug testing. There had been some close legal calls, but they had prevailed in the end. Couldn’t blame them for other people’s stupidity.

Back to the elevator, Vi pushed the doors back open and shuffled her zaftig form inside. She turned to Prism, adjusting her glasses, and let out a muted, “Sorry.” She takes another look and smiles, her thick aquatic tail lifting happily. “Oh. Hello, Prism,”

“Heya Vi!” Prism replied, hugging her fat friend. “How’re things?”

Victoria hugged back and said…
1512.title: Back to the Office

15121.content:
Victoria smiled, dimpling her cheeks. “I’m doing pretty well. Yourself?”

Prism snuggled against her friend for a moment before breaking the hug. “Great. Just got back from a warm day at the beach.”

“I heard. You have any fun with your hunky bodyguard?” Vi gave her friend a sly smile.

Prism’s snout darkened as she felt her face heat up in a blush. “No! Of course not!” She shuffled nervously. “He’s a security guard, I’m the CEO. I can’t be dating him, it’s… weird.”

Vi laughed, her belly jiggling under her lab coat. “You know what we’re producing, and you’re weirded out by a little office romance?”

Prism shuffles again. “…you should come to the beach with us some time. You do so much work here, you deserve a break.” She smiles a little. “And I know you enjoy swimming.” Ah, the classic defense. If all else fails, change the subject.

Vi shrugs. “But I like working on this. I’ve always loved chemistry, and this is a dream come true. I’m doing all sorts of things to help people. Our muscle mass formula is used to help people with atrophy after long recovery periods. Plus there’s all the people using out drugs to help realize their fantasies.” She looks down a bit, slightly embarrassed at this. She’s used them that way herself, but it’s still a bit weird for her.

Prism sighs, but keeps smiling. “You’re right, as usual, but you should think about taking a break, too. A little rest never hurt anyone. Plus, you’re my friend. We should hang out more often.”

Vi nods and smiles sheepishly, but before she can say anything, the elevator dings and the doors open. “…this is my floor.” She walks out, but holds the door open with her tail. Vi turned back to Prism and said, “How about we go out on the town later? Girls night out.”

Prism grinned warmly, “I’d love that. I’ll talk to you later then, ok? You know where to find me.” The doors started to close when she shouted out a quick, “Say ‘Hi’ to the guys in the lab for me, ok?” She winked as the doors closed, cutting off any response from Victoria.

The elevator continued upwards until it reached the top floor, Prism’s personal floor, containing her living quarters, which had plenty of room for a penthouse party, as well as a small work area, though her official office was one floor beneath her. She stepped out of the elevator into the well-furnished area. The afternoon sun was brightly illuminating the rest of the cityscape, the sunlight reaching into the rooms through the windows which made up the outer wall of the floor. As she walked into the center of the floor, she slipped out of her bikini, wanting to take a shower before getting to work. The bathroom was in the middle of the floor, and had solid, opaque walls, for obvious reasons. Before slipping into the shower, as a force of habit, she took a dose of a reverser chemical. This chemical was designed to undo any changes done to a person by her company’s product. When the reverser was done Prism looked …
15121.title: Just another day at the office

choices: Within this skinny Dragonair, there’s a fat woman waiting to get out.
She does look very different, but not like that.
151212.content: Perhaps Prism is quite a bit heavier than her altered state might suggest?
151212.title: What lies within?

choices: She’s got a bit of a lighter day today, so no need for the transformative yet.
There is an important meeting shortly, meaning that she is going to need a dose.
Someone is coming with word of some sort of emergency.
1512121.content:
Prism felt the familiar warm tingle spread through her body as the reverser did its job. In its wake, her trim body shrunk a few inches in height, but gained more than that in girth. Her already substantial bust expanded into fleshy melons, lengthened under their weight; a plush gut replaced her formerly trim and toned tummy; her curvy hips gained their share as well, taking her round butt along till it looked like she was wearing couple of pillows wrapped around her legs; even her face and neck gained some weight, softening till she had a cute double chin resting on her softer neckline. Overall, she had somewhat maintained her hourglass figure, just as a much larger hourglass.

As always, this all happened in the few seconds between Prism drinking the reverser and stepping into the shower. Prism had gotten so used to the shifting of her body that she didn’t miss a step. Turning the water on, she left it on the cooler side, enjoying the feeling of the water splashing across her body and rinsing away the residual warmth from her transformation. As she washed up, her mind drifted back to think of the preceding years that led to her current body.

Back when Prism and Victoria had started their work with the transformatives, the Dragonair had been slender as typical of her species, though her breasts had been a bit larger than average. Years of late night preparations for meetings, all of the traveling, eating whatever she could whenever she could, and little to no time to go to a gym all had their impact on her weight, and before she knew it she had ballooned up to nearly twice her starting weight from just those few years ago.

She could have certainly done something about her weight now, but she had to admit that she kind of enjoyed it. She had come to savor the weight of her bloated breasts to the feeling of her soft thighs rubbing together as she walked, but she had to maintain an image of “beauty” as the head of the head of the company, so she dutifully took a regular dosage of the chemical cocktails in order to hide away her true form within the svelte body expected of her.

With a quick twist, she shut off the water, shaking her head to get rid of some of the water still clinging to her hair. Stepping out and grabbing a towel near at hand, she quickly dried off and got ready for the rest of her day.
1512121.title: The truth coming out

choices: Pyris, her Charizard bodyguard. He doesn't look too happy…
1512122.content:
Prism stumbled forward slightly as the transformation by the reverser caused her center of gravity to shift forwards. The reversion, as the process was called, didn't take long- three seconds at the most. Once that was done, Prism looked at herself in the full body mirror, to make sure everything had fully reverted. Victoria had said that a partial reversion was impossible, but it never hurt to be careful.

What Prism truly looked like was very different than the form she took to go out in the world. She was a good foot shorter, her throat gem was gone, her wings were actually feelers, her tail became shorter, two wings sprouted from her back, and her entire body became tan. In actuality, Prism wasn't a Dragonair, but a Dragonite.

Her height and species wasn't the only thing that had changed, however. Prism shifted her feet to a wider stance as her breasts, which now hung down to her knees, forced her to do in order to remain standing. Prism had once had her breast size measured while like this. She knew that she was far beyond conventional measurements, but seeing the number 35 followed by a whopping fifteen Ds really drove it home.

As for how this happened, well, that deserves another flashback.

It was because of the chemicals, as you'd expect. Prism and Victoria had agreed to wait until after college to start their business. Between the night of their discovery and graduation, both girls had evolved. They'd graduated together, and bought a house, onto which they'd built a lab. It was in this lab that Prism had became what she was.

It was a relatively peaceful summer day. Victoria had finalized the formula for a breast expansion chemical. However, at that point it was unknown to the duo what would happen if they took multiple chemicals at the same time, and Victoria was still under the effects of a muscle enhancement chemical, so Prism tested it. The finalized formula worked perfectly, putting Prism at her current breast size. They did some basic tests to ensure that the growth was close enough to natural (it was), and it was time to take the reverser. Just as Prism's hand brushed the beaker the reverser was in, she was suffused by a white glow. Prism was too started by her sudden evolution to stop it. Once Prism realized what was happening, her evolution was too late to stop. Once she'd finished evolving, Prism took the reverser. Nothing.

Prism was shook out of her memory by the sound of knocking at her door. She yelled out "Just a minute!" and put on the bathrobe she kept for situations like this. Only a small number of people were allowed to even be on this level, and an even smaller number allowed to knock on Prism's door.

Prism finished tying her bathrobe and walked ponderously to the door- any faster and her oversized breasts would flop around and break something- most likely Prism herself. She opened the door (which swung outwards) and greeted her guest.

Her guest was…

152.content:
With another sigh out the window, the ‘morph took another look at the invitation it had received in the mail the other day…

“Congratulations! You’ve been selected to receive this invitation to the premiere summer resort, Morphia, specially designed for Pokemorphs, by Pokemorphs. The selection was made by a lotto draw of all registered Pokemorphs. You should feel honored, Morphia is the most exclusive resort ever made, the only way to get in is by the invitation you now hold…”

The rest of the invitation goes on in similar fashion, talking about the pristine beaches, first class dining, plenty of sporting activities, as well as other staff-run events.

Well..., the ‘morph thought, Seems nice enough, but invitation only? That’s odd… Ah well. Dismissing its thoughts, the morph looked around the interior of the bus that was taking all the invitees from the dock to the main complex of the island resort. They has split the busses by gender, according to how the housing areas were split. Currently, the morph was on the
152.title: Ridin' the Bus

1521.content: “…surprising this turned out as random as they claimed,” the ‘morph thought out loud to himself. Indeed, the bus was full of the widest variety of ‘morphs he had ever seen. All different species, some tall and some short. Some lanky, some buff, and some chunky. A few were dressed very richly, most were in simpler clothing, and a couple practically looked homeless. With all of the variety, the ‘morph didn’t feel too out of place, being a…

1522.content: “…surprising this turned out as random as they claimed,” the ‘morph thought out loud to herself. Like she said, the bus was packed by the most eclectic collection of morphs she had ever seen. All different species, some tall and some short. Some that looked like supermodels, dressed in tight revealing clothing that left nothing to the imagination, some that looked like whales, dressed in practical clothing and looking like they felt out of place, and everything in-between. With all of the variety, the ‘morph had no chance of standing out, despite being a…
1522.title: Girls' bus

choices: …follow a few morphs that want to take the tour.
…go with most of the other morphs to her room.
15222.content:
Dratina sighed and rested her white scaled snout on her blue scaled hand. Her fingers played along the edge of it, following the curve of one puffy cheek. She sighed again. She was definitely on the heavier side of the scale, weighing 193 pounds. True, part of the additional weight was due to her long, thick tail, but she definitely had a bit of a belly. Its white scales pudged out a bit over the waistband of her pants, a “loose” pair of jeans that hugged her equally ample rear and hips. She was just thankful that she was sensible enough to wear clothes that actually fit her, as opposed to some ‘morphs, who were in constant denial. Her green t-shirt was just the right size for her, highlighting where is should, and hiding her belly and love handles fairly well.

She mulled back to high school. She wasn’t nearly as heavy back then; in fact, she was one of the prettier girls in school, with long blue hair and stunning green eyes. Unlike the other good-looking girls, though, she didn’t really try to take advantage of her looks. Instead, she put her snout to the grindstone and studied hard. She graduated with honors and had pretty much a free ride through college. However, all the late night cram sessions with pizza and energy bars and time sitting at her desk doing homework took their toll on her as she without a doubt made the freshman 15. The rest of her college career found her on a yo-yo weight scale, continually losing and gaining back pounds as she tried various different diets. Now, being 23 and employed behind another desk at a programming firm, she was now at her latest high point in her weight. This put her at a little bit of unease, considering this being an island resort, but there were more than a few women even heavier than her, so she shouldn’t worry, right?

Dratina sighed again as the bus pulled up to the main entrance of the resort complex. It was a beautiful white structure with red brick shingles. A large circular fountain adorned the center of the circular driveway, surrounded with luscious tropical flowers. Similar flowers sat in front of the building. The whole place had a very Mediterranean feel to it, perfect for a coastal resort. The guests, both male and female were led inside into an opulently decorated lobby. There stood a smarmy Alakazam ‘morph in a white suit, practically oozing suave charm. “Hello, everyone, and welcome to Morphia!” he said in warm greeting. “As your host, allow me to welcome you to the most exclusive Pokemorph resort on the planet.” Be bowed, and put on a look of mock horror, “But our guests must be tired! Please, if you wish, you may head directly to your rooms. Your bags will already be waiting. For those of you who feel up to it, I will be leading a tour personally of the buildings and sights on the island for our guests. Never fear, though, as there will be more tours later for those of you who wish to retire for the moment.” He waves harms to the side, pointing at some doors, “Those of you who wish to go on the tour can follow me out the side doors. Those of you who wish to go to your rooms will follow some of our staff to the residence areas to get you all set and settled in.” On cue, a pair of twin-looking morphs, a male Minun and female Plusle, step down the large center staircase and into the room, cheerfully walking over to the doors opposite the ones the Alakazam was standing by and bowing to the guests. Looking around at the other guests, Dratina decides to…
15222.title: Dratina

choices: It was the Arcanine from before.
It was the Lugia from before.
It was one of the resort staff.
152222.content:
Deciding that she wasn’t feeling quite up to a tour of the resort, Dratina moved with the majority of the group towards the Minun and Plusle. As the rest of the new guests followed the Alakazam through one of the side doors, the Dratini felt like she was being watched. Glancing over, she saw two ‘morphs looking her way; one was a tall and rather well muscled male Arcanine, while the other was an even taller and exceptionally fat female Lugia. Both were quickly out of sight though as they followed with the tour group. After nearly bumping into the rear end of a Nidoqueen because of the distraction, Dratina shook her head and kept her mind on where she was going.

Soon enough, the group was led down a number of halls by the twins, each checking names off of clipboards and directing people to their rooms. Any attempts of Dratina to start small talk with another guest ended up as only a slight mutter under her breath, her shyness winning out every time, so she merely kept her head down and followed along. The number of people dwindled as more guests were directed to their rooms, till Dratina was one of the last remaining. Finally, her name was called and her room pointed out. Breaking off, she took the offered key from the Plusle before opening the door and slipping in.

Shutting the door behind her, she let out a small gloomy sigh, cursing her timidity. When she finally looked up, she let out another gasp, this time in surprise. She had been expecting a well decorated room judging from what she had seen of the resort, but this was quite a bit beyond her expectations. A lavish queen size bed was against one wall, set so that the foot was towards French doors that opened out onto a small exterior balcony. This in turn overlooked the beach a short distance away, a few guests enjoying the bright sunlight and the crystal clear waters lapping at the white sands. Tearing her gaze away, she continued her examination of her room. On several of the walls she found large and fantastic paintings, seemingly of views from around the resort and the island. The bathroom was similarly decorated and included a whirlpool bath and shower combo.

Dratina hadn’t quite been expecting the resort to be so luxurious, especially with them giving away free invitations to it. The thought of how much the upkeep at the resort must cost and entail left the woman’s head spinning.

Pushing that thought aside and heading back into the main room, she found that her bags had indeed already been brought up; a large suitcase with a few smaller travel bags neatly placed against the wall. A quick inspection there showed no signs of abuse done to her luggage or rough handling; toiletries were all in place and not leaking, clothes were still nicely folded, and so on. She went ahead and finished unpacking, putting her clothes in the closet and dresser. That done, the Dratini decided to follow through on her initial plan, i.e. resting up after the trip out to the island. Climbing onto the bed, she found it to be just as comfortable as she had thought: soft yet supporting in just the right spots. Propped up at the head of the bed, she was able to look down over her body at the view of the beach outside.

She must have dozed off shortly thereafter because the next thing she knew she was jolted awake by a loud noise. She figured that she must have been asleep for a while considering the sun was now dipping below the horizon, making the sea blaze as if afire. As she tried to get her head back in order, the noise came again, and this time she recognized it as a knock on the door. Scooting off the bed, she groggily made her way to the door and took a peek through the peephole.
152222.title: Retiring to her room

1522223.content:
Beyond the door stood a rather small Sandshrew woman dressed similarly to the twins from before.

Upon Dratina opening the door, the Sandshrew bobbed her head before saying “Greetings ma’am, you are invited to a dinner this evening to welcome new guests such as yourself. The dinner will be held in about half-an-hour on the main patio out of the main rear doors of this building. It is not a requirement for you to come if you wish not to.”

Bobbing her head again, she scurried off to the next door without waiting for any response from Dratina. She watched the staff person repeat the process with the next guest for a moment before slipping back inside her room. She was feeling a bit peckish – a fact that her stomach decided to remind her with a hungry grumble – so after a brief stop in the bathroom, she exited her room and headed towards the rear patio. Along the way, she was joined by some of the other guests heading the same way, but again kept to herself with her head slightly down. Outside, the mood was festive; light music was playing, torches were lit and assisted with other soft lighting to dispel the onset of night as the sun dipped ever lower, the sky was clear and the air was balmy, and most people were chatting happily amongst themselves. A majority of the tables were already filled up, so Dratina was forced to take a seat at an empty table near the edge.

As she sat there, she looked around at the other guests enjoying themselves. Just like on the bus ride, there was quite a mix of people, and this was even evident in the clothing; some that were recent arrivals– like Dratina – wore what was likely the clothes they wore on the trip here, while others were in various forms of beachwear, ranging from the sensible to the nearly scandalous. She also noted that there was no sign of either of the two that she thought were looking her way earlier, maybe they had decided not to come to the event. She caught herself and wondered why she was even looking for those two now. Her examination was cut short when their debonair host stepped up on a small podium and motioned for quiet.

“Greetings, one and all, and again welcome to our latest arrivals. Thank you all for coming to this little event. Those of you who have been here for a while may know that this is a regular occurrence to let everyone meet and greet as many of you are already doing and give our newest guests a further taste of what they can expect at our fine location. Now I won’t keep you any longer, I know some of you are likely getting a might hungry, so without further ado…” he waved his hands towards some of the resort staff standing nearby, who proceeded to move amongst the tables.

As the staff darted to and fro, they collected orders before returning shorting with plates of food for each person. From what Dratina could see, the food looked exquisite as she had been expecting, as was the smells that wafted her way from all directions as more and more people got their food. Her stomach made its displeasure known again, irritated by the wonderful smells but not being filled yet. The conversations dwindled but didn’t completely cease. The Dratini had the rather unfortunate luck of being on the opposite side from where the staff had started out, so it was taking a while before she could get some food.

Before this could happen though, a shadow fell over Dratina from behind, and a voice asked her, “Is this seat taken?”

Turning to face the person addressing her, she found…
1522223.title: An invitation

choices: "It was at about your point I started enjoying my fat."
"I hope you're not too much like me; I still can't lose any weight!"
15222232.content:
She found herself looking further up than expected. Past a hefty-looking belly and sizable pair of breasts, Dratina was met with the gentle smile of a Lugia. The same one from earlier, in fact. Dratina turned away. "No, go ahead," she sputtered.

         The Lugia giggled. "Thank you, dear." She then circled around the table till she was directly across from Dratina and sat down. Dratina, fighting down her bashfulness, forced herself to look the Lugia in the eye. They were a dark blue, and conveyed the same vague sense of gentleness her smile had. Her short, straight blonde hair hung down to her jawline and framed her chubby face rather nicely. She probably took good care of her appearance. So did her sense of fashion, it seemed. Her violet blouse looked comfortable, if a bit form-fitting.

         Realizing she should probably say something, Dratina nodded softly. "Sure," she mumbled, "no problem." She glanced over to the staff. They were only just getting to the center of the patio. How much longer before they got to her table?

         "Are you by yourself?"

         Dratina turned back to the Lugia. "Yeah," she said. "Just needed some time away from everything, you know?"

         The Lugia nodded, her smile now even softer. "Then it's a good thing you got an invitation."

         Dratina snorted. "No kidding." She gestured to the general area around them. "You know anything about this place? I've never heard of it."

         The Lugia shook her head. "Neither have I. Maybe it's new?"

         "Maybe. We'll have to ask." Dratina checked the staff again. Getting closer, but still a ways off from them. A moment of silence passed between them. She readjusted herself a little. More silence. "Um..."

         "Yes?"

         She fidgeted again. "When we got off the bus earlier, you, um..." Instead of picking up on her intent, like she hoped, the Lugia just waited silently. With a sigh, she continued, "Well, maybe I was mistaken, but... Look, what I'm trying to ask is: Were you looking at me?"

         The Lugia's answer came almost instantly: "I was." Her smile faltered. "Why? Does that bother you?"

         The answer was "yes", but simply saying so struck Dratina as rude. "I was just wondering why, is all," she said quickly.

         "Ah." The Lugia looked away. Probably hungry, or even starving. A large woman like her no doubt had quite the appetite. Or maybe her size was a genetic quirk. Dratina wanted to ask, but this also struck her as rude. Then again, so was this woman not answering her question.

         "Like, was it just an accident?" Dratina asked.

         "Sort of," the Lugia replied, turning back to her. "It's funny, really. I saw all sorts of women on the bus, but I was still surprised to see someone who reminded me of myself."

         "You mean me?" Surely Dratina wasn't that fat, was she? Yeah, the difference in height had to be taken into account, but her muffintop couldn't have been as bad as the Lugia's!

         "Er, I meant a younger me." The Lugia giggled nervously. There must have been a slight edge in Dratina's voice. Whoops "Sorry, I should have clarified."

         "Oh." She shrugged. "Well, I really shouldn't be offended. I mean--" Dratina hefted up her belly "--I'm not exactly svelte here."

         The Lugia's smile returned. "I wasn't criticizing you. Honestly, I was about the same size when I was younger."

         "Younger?" Dratina's head tilted a bit to the side. How old was this lady?

         "Yes, younger," the Lugia said, her smile turning coy. "But don't expect me to tell you my age."

         "Okay, whatever."

         "I mean it. Not even a teeny little hint."

         Dratina laughed. "Oh well." She leaned back. "So, back to me reminding me of you?"

         "Oh, yes! Right then! I was just going to say you reminded me of when I was your size."
15222232.title: Sudden Acquaintanceship

choices: "Didn't you know? Where do you think our milk comes from?"
"Ohh, you know...milk does a body good..."
153.content:
Sissy sighed. When people thought of "rich old uncles" they thought of inheritances and mansions, and the shenanigans resulting from them. Not Sissy's uncle. He had the gall to leave a business to his favorite little niece. A business he had run almostsinglehandedly. Which was also a dairy farm. In the ass-end of nowhere. Actually, Sissy had passed the ass-end of nowhere a while back, she was in some ultra-nowhere.

Sissy was literally the uncle's littlest niece. She was everyone's littlest everything. A sandshrew morph, she barely stood 4'4'', and looked almost like a child. Not that she'd ever admit it, but she actually wore a training bra because the extra padding helped prove she had a bust. Size 0 skinny jeans clung to a diminutive bottom. Despite her tiny stature, she had no problem picking up two giant suitcases and walking towards the ranch. The wind toyed with her many brown braids. She reached the steps to what was clearly the main building. She put down the bags and began to fumble around, looking for a key. Then, the door opened of it's own accord. Sissy's world went dark.

"Howdy! Huh? I thought I heard someone."

"Mmmph, murf mph."

"Huh? Oh!" A milktank morph stepped back from the doorway, releasing Sissy's head from her cleavage. The woman wore naught but a giant T-shirt left open then tied together to act as a giant bra. She had a pair of udders (not literal udders, you putzes) reaching halfway down her torso. Sissy was cussing up a storm.

"What the hell-ass was that? Who the f--k are you? Holy s--t." the size of the woman's tits dawned on Sissy. The girl was also pretty tall, about 6 foot, but to Sissy that made her a giant. The woman just giggled, pigtails bouncing (her tits weren't bouncing. They were quaking like jello on a stormy sea).

"Sorry! That happens a lot. I'm still new here. Well, not too knew obviously." she said, patting her breasts. Sissy's eyes went blank.

"Whaaat?"

The girl looked at her, surprised
153.title: Not quite a great inheritance

1531.content:
"That's just a habit of mine, heh heh, sorry. Anyway, my name's Maura!" the milktank extended a hand. Sissy just gave her a stare. The milktank realized the problem, and chuckled nervously, starting to sweat. She tried again, this time bending down and tilting, so that Sissy could reach, between her height and the other girl's bust. Sissy shook her hand, and then wiped it off as soon as she could.

"So you work here? You worked for my uncle?"

"You're Gerald's niece! D'awwwwww!" the girl grabbed for Sissy. Before she knew it, Sissy was swept off her feet in a bear hug, squeezed in between two pink tankards. Maura carried her in this boob-hug into the building.

"My bags, you dumb broad! I'll fire you, I swear I will!"

"You've got to meat the girls!"

"It's meet, not meat."

"What?"

"Nevermind."

"Oh, we've been waiting so long too meet you!"

"To."

"Right. Here we are!" Maura said. Sissy sighed.

"All I see it your tits. What the hell are up with these by the way?"

"Sorry, here you are!" Sissy was released. Or, more accurately, dropped. She sighed. At least she liked the ground. Finally, she got up and turned around. Behind her, Maura stepped forward, the underside of her tits resting against Sissy's head.

"Holy f--king hell." Sissy said. In front of her were green pastures, a barn,even a stream winding its way through. The pastures were fenced off, and in them grazed dozens of regular Milktank. Well, regular as in non-anthro. They were the fattest pokemon Sissy had ever seen. They could barely reach the grass to eat it. They looked content as all get out. But the people drew Sissy's eyes. The heat made their minimal clothing kind of understandable. Their bodies....well, to be fair, some of them looked normal. Kind've normal. Most of the men, at least, though a couple were truly ripped. But there were a few girls there as well. One of them tits bigger than Maura's by a long shot. One's were only kinda big, but man did she have an ass. There were seven employees, and Maura made eight. Three guys, five girls.

"Okay, what in the nine cream-filled layers of hell is going on here." Sissy asked.
1531.title: Well, something's going on here

choices: "Now that she's gone, we can finally (your choice)"
"Let's start this vacation right - snacking, TV, and relaxing"
"Maybe we should go out, say to the mall?"
154.content:
"Penny! Jenny! Come say goodbye, would you?" a female pikachu morph on the cusp of middle age called up the stairs. A suitcase stood by her feet, and she wore a wide brimmed hat.

"Coming mom!" came two voices in perfect unison. A moment later, two teenage girls came thumping down the stairs. Other sisters might jockey for position or at least be bothered by the tight fit, but not Penny and Jenny. Penny, a plusle (the alliteration being the only way anyone remembered) and Jenny, a minun, could only just be told apart by the tips of their ears or their flushed/pale cheek spots. The two girls gave their mother two identical smiles. Their mother smiled back weakly. The girls weirded even her out. They were inseparable, and seemed to be exactly the same girl in most regards. They had hit puberty at the same time, and now at 16 both wore healthy C-cup bras, 30'' waist jeans, and stood exactly 5'6''. But more than that, they had the same taste in food, movies, pastimes....there were small things, like how Penny preferred caramel with her ice cream while Jenny liked butterscotch, but it was still uncanny. That didn't stop their mother from giving them both a big, heartfelt hug.

"Are you sure you two are going to be okay?" she asked.

"Of course mom." Penny asked. The girls actually designated who got to talk when they were both addressed, since before they did that they'd always answer in unison, creeping everyone out. It's was Penny's turn today, obviously.

"I'll call once my flight lands. You know you can rely on Ms. Kanya next door."

"We'll be fine mom." Penny said with a laugh. "Right Jenny?"

"Sure thing! We're so glad you're finally getting away."

"Yes, but even then it's business." their mother said, letting her daughters go. "I'll try and find time to relax. You two be good. Oh, and one more thing. I want you two to try to get out more okay? It's great that you get along so well, but if it was up to you you'd never see anyone else. You should find yourself - yourselves - a couple of boyfriends."

"You want us to start dating while you're gone?" Penny asked with a giggle.

"I'm just saying you two could do with a little more socialization. Don't stay cooped up in your room together all summer, okay?"

"Promise." the girls said in unison. Their mother smiled, picked up her bag, and headed for the door.

"See you in a month and a half!"

"Byye!"

Their mother left. Penny and Jenny turned to one another, grinning mirrors. Penny spoke to her sister. They probably didn't need to, but it was a good habit to keep talking.
154.title: Double the trouble, double the fun

1551.content:
Life was miserable for Jasper. You would think after recently evolving into a Machoke morph, the 16 year old would have ended up bigger; especially in the family she was in. Jasper was a very rare case. Normally all Pokémon born from eggs take after the female. However, Jasper took after her father. Her mother was a Infernape, while her father was a Machoke; meaning she was born a Machop. Machops are generally small, but not as small as she was. She stood about a foot smaller than those of her kind. What was worse was that she never even had the strength to make up for it; her smaller size made her have weaker muscles. This made her miserable, it was like she never got anything from her parents. Her Infernape mother was not just strong, but beautiful. Her beautiful crafted amazon body was only coupled by her beautiful curves. She was a world renowned fighter, had championship titles in over three countries, and had been on the cover for over several magazines involving both muscle/fitness and modelling. Her father was a bodybuilding Machamp, whose height and muscles mass surpassed most of his species by over two feet. He was also well known, but more for his performance on his competitions. So how was it that being born from these two titans meant she was both flat as a board and weaker than her own kind?

To make matters worse, her siblings did not make it any better. Truthfully, she only had one real sibling. But her mother adopted a young child while in one of her country tournaments. She was the second youngest of the three. Her two year older sister, Ina, was a Monferno who was not only taller than her but looked like her mother; beautiful. While she never spoke or said anything to make Jasper feel bad, just having her mother's beautiful body was enough. Then it was her adopted brother, Jang. He was a Makuhita about two years younger than her. Sure he was round, but he was bigger and more muscular than she was! And he never even evolved yet! To make matters worse, he was the bragger. He made her life a living hell. He even had his own entourage at the school, making her life even more miserable. All she ever wanted was to get bigger and stronger. Little did she know that...
1551.title: Dreams of Being the Biggest

choices: She has a personal trainer friend that can help
She has a college friend who has been "experimenting" with a growth formula
15511.content:
The door of the household was slammed as Jasper ran by with her eyes red. Ina looked up from her book, seeing Jang walk in after her. "Hey come one! I was only joking! There's no way you can even beat up a Magikarp!" He laughed at his own joke as another door slam was heard upstairs; Jasper's bedroom.

Ina made a small sigh, "Jang, couldn't you tone down your ruffian behavior?"

"Sorry four eyes, try asking me when Weachoke gains muscle mass for once!" The Makuhita laughed as he exited the house while laughing.

Ina could not take this anymore. She wasn't one to get into a fight, but watching her little sister being harassed so much is her end point. She took her glasses off, put her book down, then went upstairs. She gently knocked on her sister's bedroom door, "Sis? You alright?" The only response she got was crying. Ina took it upon herself to enter. There was Jasper, crying her eyes out on her bed. Ina sat down on beside her, "Jasper, you cannot let Jang get to you like this."

"Easy for you to say!" Jasper spoke, looking at her sister with those blue eyes turned red. "You have mom's beauty! I have nothing! No beauty, no muscle, no nothing!" She cried more, "I just want to be bigger...at least bigger than Jang!" Jasper wasn't ugly per say, she just lacked any curves.

Her sister sighed once more, "Jasper...I think I know something that can help you." Her younger sister looked up.
15511.title: Her big sister Ina was going to help

info.brief_description: A pokemorph interactive story for everyone, WG, GT(S), TF, and normal stories available.
info.description:
Here we go, a Pokemorph interactive story. And since I haven’t seen any other stories with Pokemorphs, I figure I’ll try to cater this one to some of the various groups we have here on writing.com, more info in chapter 1.

Main rules:
-No death/gore, violence is ok in the scope of a pokemon/morph battle
-No rape, with minors or otherwise
-No story poaching/killing. I will prune if I have to.
-Keep it sensible. No "OMG GAIN 5000 POUNDS/3000 FEET/etc..." kinds of chapters. They're ok in some cases if they're well written, but this is a /story/, try to draw it out a bit more, mmm'kay?
-When adding chapters, make sure that the two choices are actually different. Making the choices "Burger King" and "Taco Bell" are not different! They are both resturants, and it doesn't really matter, save for some instances. If you can't really think of something else, just leave it as "Something Else" and let the next person figure it out.
-Have fun and contribute. :)
